STATS Get up-to-date, real-time stats and standings. SHOP Purchase game tickets, OKC Dodgers souvenirs, and more. Users college level math with some knowledge in multivariable analysis will appreciate in depth all the features of this app. 3D-Functions Grapher is free a multivariable analysis tool designed to graph two variabled f(x,y). Application makes dynamic calculations for user-input equations, such us double integral and partial derivates, differentiable operators ... These all calculations requires internet connection. 3D-Functions Grapher Covers the following features: - 2D and 3D GRAPHING: Graph one and two variabled f(x,y) functions. - INTEGRATION: calculates analytic double integral, also Numeric integral is supported. - DIFFERENTIATION: calculate partial derivates Laplacian and Gradient operators. - EQUATIONS SOLVER: Solve equations with x and y variables. - HELP SECTION: functions writting, examples, graphics explanation ... - CONTACT FORM: with it you can obtain support directly on this app.
release_text: - Double integral calculation (definite or indefinite!). - Plotting in R2 and R3 spaces - Differential operators calculations.

description: Powerful and yet full of convenience features that make using it fun and easy. Each of the keys are equipped with a "cheat sheet" so if you happen to forget how to use a key, just tap and hold it for two seconds, and the "cheat sheet" will open in front of you. Four display formats are provided: Fix, All Digits, Scientific, and Business. Using the Business format you can set the the calculator to display for instance “12.5 M” instead of “12,500,000”. Use the Smart Snapshot to view all financial variables, cash flow variables, data storage, and program listing in one convenient window. You can also enter up to twelve digits, instead of just ten! Quick 12C supports TVM functions, Cash flow analysis, Amortization, Depreciation calculations, Bonds calculations, Calendar functions, Percentages, Statistics, Programming, and lots more. Feel free to contact us if you have questions. We reply to all inquiries.

description: Honeybee Hijinks is a fun and addictive endless flying game for kids and adults of all ages! You are a honeybee who must avoid crashing into walls and the ground while collecting honeycombs. Race for the top score and see how far you can fly! Simple easy to pick up and play controls for fast on the go flying fun. Honeybee Hijinks was designed in the spirit of the late Flappy Bird and helicopter games. Only easier! **Special Credit** The music for Honeybee Hijinks came from Kevin MacLeod at incompetech. Search for him online, he's got some awesome tracks!

description: Magical Music Box is a musical app for kids, toddlers and babies. It plays beautiful kids songs from the whole world with an authentic sound of music box. “Highly recommended - *****” -- Smart Kids’ Apps “Enchanting music box animations and music - ****” -- The iMums “A wonderful trip down memory lane - ****” -- Smart Apps for Kids “Impressed with the production quality of the app - ****” -- iKidsApps To play the songs, children turn their finger on the screen, and the app becomes alive magically, playing the music while displaying beautiful animations. Typical kids songs like Twinkle Twinkle little Star, Old MacDonald had a Farm and Jingle Bells can be played, in addition to songs and melodies from popular and classical culture (see full list below). The Magical Music Box can also be used as the perfect lullaby player for babies to help them sleep. Just choose one of the lullabies, set the time of duration in the preferences and press the automatic mode button. The best bedtime melodies for baby sleep well. FEATURES - 36 songs and more to come (12 songs in the free lite version) - 8 original animated music boxes (4 in the free lite version) - manual or automatic play - song information and lyrics EDUCATIONAL CONTENT - listening practice: kids learn to play the songs at the right speed - content awareness: discover the diversity of music and songs - history and culture: learn facts about each song PRIVACY This app: -does not contain third party ads -does not contain in-app purchases -does not use data collection tools -contains a protected parent section in which you will find links to our other apps, to our website and to social networks Magical Music Box (mobile app) is certified by the kidSAFE® Seal Program. To learn more, click on the seal or go to http://www.kidsafeseal.com . description: *** 50% OFF for a Limited Time Only *** 10bii Financial Calculator is a powerful financial calculator for Android, which supports all functions of HP 10bII Financial Calculator and beyond. With more than 120 functions for financial analysis, business, statistics, and mathematics, and modeled on the popular HP 10bII Financial Calculator, 10bii Financial Calculator app combines precise mathematics, intuitive display, and ease-of-use in one package. It allows you to easily calculate time value of money, amortization, investment value, mortgage and loan payments, interest rates, and more using powerful and intuitive worksheets. *** Highlight Features *** • Time Value of Money TVM • Amortization • Cash flow analysis: Net Present Value (NPV), and Internal Rate of Return (IRR) • Mortgage and Loan payment calculation • Business percentage calculation like Cost, Price, Margin, and Markup • Interest Rate Conversion between Nominal and Annual Effective Interest Rates • Statistical analysis • 10 Memories for storage • Choice of Chain and Algebraic Calculation Mode • Scientific capabilities, including log, exponent, power etc • Key click sound feedback • N, I/YR, PV, PMT and FV values displayed right above buttons • One-click access to settings, user manual, and customer support within the app • More ... **** Support **** Feel free to email us at support@vicinno.com whenever you need help. **** Stay tuned **** Like us: www.facebook.com/vicinno Follow us: www.twitter.com/vicinno

VOA Pod ensider is a application to subscribe and study the podcast contents provided from VOA Learning English Podcast( http://learningenglish.voanews.com/Podcast/0.html) . * Supported Features - Display, download the contents provided from VOA Podcast - Play the contents in offline mode completely after downloading a content - Support dictionary mode with ColorDict - Resuming to download a content if you failed to download the content. - Favorite contents (Click a item at the content list): More accessibility to your favorite contents. - Keep the history by listening count. - Move the position of player to -30s,-10s,+10s and +30s from the current position. - Display the mobilized script for listening a pod content in the internal player. - Set automatic play and resuming from the previous position to On/Off by setting menu. - Pause to play when you have an incoming call. * Notices - This is NOT the official application from VOA Learning English. - Created for more convenience and efficiency for the contents of VOA Learning English. - VOA(Voice Of America) has all copyright about these provided contents. - Feel free to let me know if you have any suggestions about this application. * Keyword - VOAPod - VOA Pod - Learning English - English Listening - English Study - TOEIC - TOEFL Thank you.

This addicting word search puzzle will always give you a new challenge and keep your brains busy for many hours! The challenge is to search & find as many English words as you possible can from the scrambled letter grid within the two-minute time limit. Select the letters with easy swipe gesture, find all the hidden words from the grid to score points and gain achievement stars! After finding a word, the corresponding letter tiles are replaced with new ones so the grid changes constantly during the game. You can also use free hints or replace the whole grid if you can't find any words. This word game also includes a casual free game - mode where you can search words from three different sized scrambled boards without the time limit. The game board is saved automatically so you can continue the word game session later on right from the state you left it. You can play quick word puzzles with your tablet or phone anywhere! New! You get five free hints as a daily reward that you can use freely during each day! The hints highlights the letters of a scrambled word letter by letter so you get a daily boost to your current free game play. ★ Addicting word search game with time limit and free modes ★ Huge dictionary of English words ★ Free daily hints to help word searching ★ Unlimited number of scrambled letter grids ★ Smooth animations and game play ★ Word search with easy swipe gesture Love solving word puzzles? Give a fun challenge to your brains! Let the word search begin!
release_text: version 1.4: - support new devices - rendering optimization version 1.3.5: - improved swipe gesture - added themes to letter tiles version 1.3.3: - free hints are valid for whole day - layout fixes to main screen icons - loading screen on start up version 1.3.2: - five free hints as a daily reward! version 1.2: - updated new vocabulary version 1.1: - usability improvements - smaller ad banner on free version version 1.0.4: - the first English release of the game

description: This is a super healing free app game 「Hamster Life」,you can raise your hamster easily and happily. 「Hamster Life」is a free game app which can play with hamster and through with healing life. You can give food to it, touch its cute face. If hamster is full of foods it even take food home, there ara many of cute behavior you can see. Not only touch or give food to it,even if put the hamster to the wheels. Thera are hundreds of way to take care your hamster. Let's take care it everyday and found many kinds of look about it. *Now Start the game by dragging the hamster to the wheel! *You can save coins if you let hamster to play the facilities. ■How to play・How to raise the hamster *The way to take care hamster ・You could give food to it or touch it cute face. ・Press the hamster longly and you could move the hamster.You also can change your furniture or decoration. ・Double click screen, hamster will come to you! *How to save the coins ・If you touch hamster or give it food many times,EXP could be accumulated. ・If Hamsters are full of food,they will take foods back to house! ・If Hamster come near to water feeder,will start to drink water cutely! ・Use coin to add the mount of hamster, also can accumulate EXP easily. ・Thera still have other way to save coins, let's find it out! *The way to get cheeses Just take care you hamster,there will give coins when you level up. And take the hamster to walk around, there also will give you coin when you level up. *How to add new hamster Please click the hamster which on the top of screen.Then you can exchage or add new hamster. If you want to promote the stage level, you also can exchange by cheese. *How to change the decoration of house ・You can save coins and exchange furniture by coins in shop. ・After you bought new furniture or decoration, you can decorate it directly. *About take a walk It is very easy to play, just array three blocks with the same color vertically or Horizonally. Then you could get coin or cheese or hamsters. *About event According to your level, official side prepares many kinds of event. Let's get the gorgeous reward and take card our hamster!! *About start page After you finish tutorial, you can choose home or walk mode. You can pass you life with hamster and free to decorate the house . *When you remove app or reset the game data,the user data will be reset,please be attention. *If you cannot open the app, please restart your device and close application first. *When you send mail to us, please let us know which device you are using and your mail address.

루미키즈 앱북 신데렐라는 기존의 플레이 방식의 보기만 하는 동화가 아닌 아이들이 직접 스토리 진행에 참여하도록 유도 하는 인터렉티브 동화 어플리케이션 입니다. 다양한 터치 이벤트, 터치시 말하기, 장면전환, 진동 피드백, 터치시 변신, 구두신기기, 말 달리기, 그림 기억 퍼즐 게임 등 다양한 기능을 담았습니다. description: Can't wake up? With this alarm clock you sure will get up on time, thanks to up to eight different Wake Up Tasks which won't let you turn the alarm off until you finish them! Mind or body stimulation? Or maybe having to actually leave the bed? How about practising foreign language while we are at it? This application features options that you would expect from alarm clock, like setting multiple alarms, daily repeating or snooze, plus many more, letting you set it up to your liking in almost every way possible: - Smooth Wake Up – dimmed screen, volume rising, fully customizable - Snooze Music – choose music that will play during your snooze - Awake Test – ever woke up just to turn alarm off and go back to sleep? If you fail Awake Test few minutes after finishing alarm, alarm will be started again! - many music sources – ringtones, music files (.mp3), playlists, shoutcasts or build-in extra loud noises - starting chosen application after alarm’s finish - auto turning off during phone calls Wake Up Tasks: Math – do some math equations Memory – find pairs for each coloured tile Order – set tiles in correct order Repeat – repeat shown click sequence Barcode – you have to get out of bed to scan the code placed in bathroom, kitchen or just on your table! Rewrite – carefully rewrite randomly generated text Shake – shake your phone until you feel awake Match– connect word pairs – has build in Capital-Country collection, but you can easily make your own, for example with words in different languages! You can configure every Method and test it quietly without running the alarm, to set it just the way you like. Application is available only in english ------------------ This free app is ad supported and displays banner and full-screen ads. Ad-free paid version is available. ------------------ Sony Xperia users! Make sure to add application to 'Stamina Mode' white list - without it alarm won't be able to wake up the device! ------------------ Application was tested on a few devices with different Android versions, but errors still can occur. I am working to fix every bug reported, but I am unable to fix errors mentioned only in comments section – please use build-in Logger to report bugs – your help is really appreciated! ------------------ Alarm WILL ring after device reboot! However mind, that it won't work if device is off or if you Force Close this application with any Application Manager or Battery Saver app. ------------------ Used permissions: WAKE_LOCK – let’s alarm start when screen is off RECEIVE_BOOT_COMPLETED – to load alarms’ information on phone’s boot VIBRATE – for vibrations READ_PHONE_STATE – to stop alarm during phone calls WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE – for writing backup, users' custom settings and log files MODIFY_AUDIO_SETTINGS – so alarm is able to play on max volume every time WRITE_SETTINGS – for displaying information about next alarm on lock screen BLUETOOTH and BLUETOOTH_ADMIN - for option to disable Bluetooth during alarm DISABLE_KEYGUARD - needed for hiding lock screen on some devices INTERNET – for shoutcasts/web radios and advertisements ACCESS_COARSE_LOCATION, ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE - for advertisements
release_text: 3.2.1: Minor fixes 3.2.0: New features: - Quit Block - now you can't escape your alarm without finishing Tasks! - Group Modify - modify any number of alarms with easily - option to show reminder/motivational text during alarm - option for alarm to start during phone call - simplified 'add alarm' dialog Fixes: - now on phones with two external memories, both can be browsed - minor fixes

ANDROPLAYER REQUIRES ZOOPER WIDGETS PRO™, MEDIA UTILITIES™ AND ACCUWEATHER® (AccuWeather® required for weather hotspot. If you do not have AccuWeather® please set it to your preferred weather app). YOU MUST HAVE MEDIA UTILITIES™ INSTALLED AND CONFIGURED BEFORE INSTALLING ANDROPLAYER. AndroPlayer is a media player skin that has two hotspots. Touch the time and you will open the Android Clock App, touch the temperature and you will open Accuweather (default setting - if you don not have Accuweather installed please customize to your preferred weather app.) In Media Utilities™: Go to settings, check the box for "Zooper™", check "Make cover art available", set cover art size to 200 and set coverart shape to square. ***Time Design Clocks is not affiliated with or sponsored by AccuWeather® or Zooper Widgets Pro™***

"Crack your mobile screen" is a perfect prank app to fool your friends that they have broken your phone screen. This awsome app will display broken glass image on the screen of your mobile phone, so that it will look like the screen was broken! You can choose to show screen break effect in three different ways: - after user shakes the phone. - after setting the amount of seconds. - after user touches the screen. You can also choose if you want to play crack sound. Moreover you can set if android system works or not after screen crack effect is visable. REMEMBER: You can always remove broken screen effect by shaking your phone. We have more! This app is also live wallpaper (you can set cracked screen as your wallpaper) and widget (you can put direct link to app on your home screen)! Download it and try it on your friends! If you have any problems with this app please report it to us and we will fix it as fast as we can!

A sequel to the popular PC game “Treasures of Montezuma” will please fans of puzzles and the match-3 genre. Over 100 levels of ancient Aztec secrets and riddles, plenty of magical artifacts and three game modes – that's what awaits for the players. Playing “Treasures of Montezuma 2” you'll have to combine pieces of the same color and complete missions within the given time. Success will be rewarded with bonus scores and gold which you may spend to purchase various bonuses and upgrades. Upon the discovery of Aztec magic and gathering all the precious jewels the player will rebuild the Heavenly City Tenochtitlan. Game features: • Over 100 levels (full version game) • 3 game modes • Magical bonuses and totems • Mysterious atmosphere of Aztec civilization ***** The QualityIndex of "Treasures of Montezuma 2" is 7.9 http://android.qualityindex.com/games/20840/treasures-of-montezuma-2 NOTE: 1024x768 and 800x600 devices not supported at this time. _____________________________________ FOLLOW US: @Herocraft WATCH US: youtube.com/herocraft LIKE US: facebook.com/herocraft.games

With a simple yet stylishly powerful interface, this professional photographic camera App includes a large variety of live photo filters in lightning-fast real-time, such as several Lomo and Lo-Fi effects, artistic painting, cartoon and paper styles, retro, vintage, FAUX HDR, analog, and several deformations types, including even fisheye, wide angle camera filters, and many more. In total over 250 customizable filters, and over 20 frames. For HDR fans, produce the most beautiful images with the FAUX HDR tone mapping filters. Create little planet photos with the Stereographic filters, or use the preset tinyplanet or Little Planet mode. Lomography, Analogic and Hipster photography lovers will be pleased with the emulated effects of some classic cameras such as Holga, Zenit, Lomo LC-A, and even awesome 16mm and super-8 styles. Enjoy video recording with all the filters, including fast-motion video recording, and pause-resume capabilities. (Video recording requires Jelly Bean 4.3 or higher) With the easiest Panorama mode you can find. The manual nature of the Panorama mode gives you full control over the final result. Try using different filters, people or objects in each shot to create unique panoramic images. Your imagination is the only limit. Record GIF animations with all the available effects. You can also change the GIF recording speed to produce funny GIF animations, or even record GIFs in reverse mode. With unique features that DSLR camera owners will envy. Manual controls for several photographic settings such as exposure and exposure lock, brightness, contrast and saturation, All filters allow a complete and unique manual customization. Get a mad-face selfie with the unique Virtual Flash for Front-Facing Cameras. The idea is very simple; in complete darkness the screen will light up enough to give you the chance to snap your grin. Not all effects are suitable for this, so try it first with "original". The unique Cameringo viewfinder allows to keep shooting while in review mode, giving the option to compare the last photo against the live preview. Plus, the horizon level indicator gives you now better control over the angle of the image. Other included features are on screen Auto Exposure Lock (AE-L), image stabilizer, silent camera mode, histogram, Incognito / spy mode, Geo Tagging (GPS Location), guidelines, tap to shoot, macro-focus, set the Artist and Copyright into the EXIF tag, and even the option to shoot perfectly squared photos making it easier to upload into Instagram.

Find out the best periods for fishing trips, based on Solunar theory. Free, and sporting a simple and friendly interface, Clear Fishing Time will help you: - Discover at a glance the best feeding periods for fish within a month - Get one-click information for each day and place (the best times for fishing, the hours the sun sets and rises, the phases of the moon) - Get the weather forecast for your chosen location (temperature, wind speed and direction etc) - Identify new fishing areas by directly searching the map or by entering a name (integrated with Google Maps) - Save your favourite locations so you can find them again later more easily You won’t have to work out complicated graphs and you don’t need to be an astrophysicist to be able to use the results provided by this application. Everything is laid out clearly and intuitively. Whether you’re fishing for carp or predators, or whether you’re fly-fishing or coarse angling, maximise your chances of getting a bite with Clear Fishing Time. Organise your fishing trips wisely! Clear Fishing is a European developer specialising in mobile-phone applications dedicated to freshwater sport fishing. Our team is made up of competition anglers, consultants, angling journalists, graphic artists, animators, photographers, editors, and programmers from more than 6 countries. For more than a decade, we have been passionately dedicated to providing anglers with magazines and guidebooks, to organising events, competitions, fairs, and exhibitions, and to creating websites and mobile phone applications. If you would like to find out more about fishing techniques, tackle, bait, lures, lines, and knots, as well as tips and expert advice, then be sure to discover the other applications internationally available as part of the Clear Fishing brand. We have carefully designed and structured the information we bring you so that you will have greater success on your next fishing trip.

MTG Deck Builder allows players to build decks based off of the popular Magic The Gathering trading card game. Users can search for specific cards and add them to their decks which are stored online for their convenience. 1.1.0 ChangeLog -Searching for a card by name will now will ask for an exact name if the user searches an invalid card name -Users can now do a blank search with no colors selected or name entered if they want all cards returned -Users will no longer be able to hit a black screen when reaching MyDecks when not logged in -Users will no longer be able to click "add to deck" while not logged in -Changed "Done" button to "sign in" or "sign up" depending on the activity -There is now a confirm password box when users are signing up -After signing in users will be returned to the main screen and see a "logged in as ..." toast -When users search card sets the block will display as "none" instead of "null" -Tapping outside a textbox in empty space will now minimize the keyboard -Several small display issues Special thanks to everyone who left feedback on the play store and r/magicTCG

★★New DioDict 4, Quick Search Enabled Electronic Dictionary, Now Available★★ The complete Collins COBUILD Advanced Dictionary • Made specially for learners of English • Over 146,000 words, meanings and examples • Thousands of notes on grammar and ways to use words • No internet connection needed. **Free upgrade available for DioDict 3 Collins English Dictionary users. DioDict 4 is only compatible with OS versions ICS (Android 4.0) and above. If your device’s OS is ICS or higher, DioDict 4 will be downloaded and installed. If your device’s OS is lower than ICS, DioDict 3 will be automatically selected for download. If you are using DioDict 3, please note that each version has different functions. ** =====Dictionary features include===== Collins COBUILD Advanced Dictionary • 41,000 word entries and 105,000 text samples including all frequently used words. • a long list of phrasal verbs with detailed descriptions of their meaning. • meanings explained using commonly used words only, so learners can easily understand entries. • British and American English vocabulary. British/American-only words are specially marked. • explanations and examples use natural sounding, commonly used grammar and expressions. • thousands of examples of real English showing learners how a word is normally used. • audio files with American native speakers‘ pronunciation of words and sentences. • a pronunciation guide (IPA) with word stress shown next to each word entry. • large amount of grammatical information: -- parts of speech (noun, verb, adj. etc.) of each word. -- irregular verb forms and noun plurals. -- which prepositions are used with which verbs and adjectives. -- whether a noun is countable or non-countable. =====Powerful & Specialized Functions===== ▶ Easier Search with 'Multi Search' ◀ • When you enter a word to search, relevant sentence idioms and phrasal verbs are searched for and spelling is checked automatically. • Multiple types of searches are available in a single search window without the need to select a search mode. ▶ Search Features ◀ • Wildcard search: enter “?” or “*” in place of a letter when you are unsure of the spelling (e.g., “man*ver” retrieves the word “maneuver”). • Search not only for words, but for phrases or examples. • Search for similar words: e.g. clicking on “adding” in an entry yields a list of similar and derivative words: “addition”, “additional”, “additive”, “addition reaction”. • The search results are listed in real-time when you enter a keyword. • Links to Google so that you can search for more information on a particular word. ▶ Vocab Revision ◀ • Pronunciation guide from the built-in American Text To Speech (TTS) solution. • History menu lists all your recent word searches. • Save words and expressions to any number of flashcard folders. • You can efficiently learn the words saved in the folders using the Cradle and Yes/No Quizzes function. =====Reliable Dictionary App Provider===== ***Electronic Dictionary Application Chosen by Top Smartphone Manufacturers, such as Samsung and LG. - Installed on over 90% of Samsung and LG smartphones with users all over the world. Highest market share for dictionary applications. *** The Number One Company in the Domestic Mobile Electronic Dictionary Market for Over 10 Years, with Over 100 staff in R&D. - The company’s own testing department performs meticulous testing, along with a customer support department. * You may also notice a $1.00 transaction from Google, which is actually a pending authorization request between Google billing system and the bank that issued your credit or debit card, so you won't end up paying the extra $1.00. ■ CS center : support@diotek.com ■ www.facebook.com/DIOTEK

description: ****50% Off-Limited Time Only******* Compiled by expert teams of Spanish and English lexicographers, this edition contains over 175,000 words and phrases, and 240,000 translations, including numerous new words that have entered both languages in recent years. Not only does it provide remarkable coverage of the general, scientific, literary, and technical vocabulary of contemporary Spanish and English, the Concise Oxford Spanish Dictionary is also easy to use, with a clear layout. The dictionary also provides extensive help with tricky issues of grammar and word usage well as fun and informative culture notes on life and living in the Spanish-speaking world. Features * Authoritative coverage of over 175,000 words and phrases, and over 240,000 translations * Comprehensive English-Spanish and Spanish-English dictionary with new words and phrases based on findings from Oxford's English and Spanish language reading programmes * Quick and easy to use * Cultural notes on life and living in the Spanish-speaking world throughout the text A SEARCH TOOL featuring search autocomplete to help you find words quickly by displaying predictions similar to the terms you're typing. You also get enhanced search extras including: * A quick search of words while you type. * A 'fuzzy filter' when you are not sure of the correct spelling of a word. * A 'keyword' search for finding key words within compound words. * A wild card search function (*) which can replace a letter or entire parts of a word. * Download dictionary definitions locally for offline word lookup. A LEARNING TOOL including a number of features that help you further enhance your vocabulary: * A 'Favorites' feature to create custom folders with lists of words from the extensive library, including cross-curriculum words. * History list to help you easily review looked-up words. * Discover more about language with the special language notes. * See words in context with example sentences. * 'Word-of-the-day' feature with homescreen widget. description: 저희의 미숙으로... 업데이트를 할 수 있는 파일을 잃어버려 지금까지 업데이트를 하지 못했습니다. 올해 안으로 전면 수정된 다함께스트레칭2가 나올예정이니 조금만 기다려주세요. ^^ 스트레칭은 현대생활에 필수적인 부분입니다. 하지만 사람들은 스트레칭의 중요성은 알면서도 스트레칭을 습관적으로 하지 않습니다. 이로 인하여 장기간 스마트폰 사용으로 인한 손목터널증후군, 책상에서 오랜 시간 모니터 사용 등으로 인한 거북목증후군, 발바닥을 스트레칭을 하지 않고 조깅을 하여 생기는 족저근막염등 많은 부작용들이 발생할 수 있습니다. 다함께 스트레칭은 ①생활 속에서 ②운동전, 후 ③의자에서 ④취침 전, 기상 후 총 4가지로 구성되어있으며 남녀노소 모두 스트레칭을 습관화하는데 도움을 주는 어플리케이션입니다. 또한 유트브를 통한 다양한 스트레칭 동영상을 제공하여 다양한 종류의 스트레칭을 제안합니다. 1. 스트레칭 종류 1) 생활 속에서 등산 스트레칭, 지하철 스트레칭 2) 운동 전,후 실내운동(헬스), 실외운동(조깅)스트레칭 3) 의자에서 학생, 직장인등 의자에서 간단히 할 수 있는 스트레칭 4)잠자기 전, 후 일어나서, 자기 전에 하는 스트레칭 + 성장기 어린이, 청소년을 위한 키 크는 스트레칭 2. 다함께 스트레칭의 기능 1) 스트레칭 카운터 기능 다함께 스트레칭은 스트레칭을 하며 단순히 앱을 보며 따라하는 것이 아닌 터치, 센서, 타이머 등을 이용 하여 사용자가 수행하는 스트레칭 동작의 개수를 직접 세어주고 기록해줍니다. 스트레칭 동작마다 카운터 가 각각 다르니 카운터 동작은 스트레칭 설명부분을 읽어주세요. 2) 즐겨찾기 기능 사용자가 자주하는 스트레칭은 즐겨찾기를 하여 언제나 쉽게 스트레칭을 할 수 있게 도와줍니다. 스트레칭 동작설명 부분의 ♥를 눌러주세요. 3) 계획 기능 다함께 스트레칭의 가장 큰 목적은 스트레칭의 생활화 입니다. 내정보의 달력을 터치하면 자신이 할 스트레 칭 동작을 계획할 수 있고, 알람기능과 한 달간 얼마나 스트레칭을 하였는지를 분석할 수 있게 하여 스트레칭을 꾸준히 할 수 있게도와드리겠습니다. 4)스트레칭 영상 유명한 유투브 스트레칭 영상채널을 제공하여 다함께 스트레칭 자체의 콘텐츠 이 외에도 다양한 스트레칭을할 수 있습니다. 바로 영상보기를 터치하면 데이터낭비를 방지하기 위해 바로 동작하지 않게 하였으므로 꼭 설정에서 인터넷을 체크하신 후 되도록이면 와이파이가 제공되는 환경에서 이용해주세요. 3. 추후 업데이트 내용 다함께 스트레칭은 추후에 테마변경, 도움말 기능, 스트레칭 컨텐츠 추가등 업데이트를 할 예정입니다. 지속적인 업데이트로 전 국민의 스트레칭의 생활화를 위해 끊임없이 노력하겠습니다. 4. 문의사항 수정했으면 좋았을 부분, 버그뿐 만이 아니라 문의사항이 있으신 분은 언제든지 apptive@naver.com 으로 연락주세요, 전 국민이 스트레칭을 생활화하는 그날까지 다함께 스트레칭!

The rose wedding cake game is a fun and adorable wedding cake cooking game that gives you a chance to create your own dream wedding cake that would look beautiful on the table in front of your guests. With so many different designs and colours to choose from you can really make your wedding cake stand out. This game features many things as cake color, side cake decoration, trimming decoration, plate decoration, flowers, top decoration, and additional decorations. With this bride cake game you simply click on each separate icon at the top of the screen and then click on each of the decorations or colors below then watch as your cake takes place. With the last icon you simply click and hold the mouse on the decoration you like and simply drag the decoration across and place it where you need it to be on the cake to create the perfect finishing touches. If you wish to restart from scratch, all you have to do is press the “reset” button at the bottom left hand side of the screen and your cake will go back to its original form. When you finish your cake decoration, you simply press the “show” button at the bottom left hand side of the screen and watch as your cake transforms in front of you in all its glory. If you want to replay the game over again, all you have to do is press the “replay” button and you will go back to the start of the game. These rose cake cooking games are great for the inner chef and is perfect for anyone who fantasizes about their dream wedding. Perfect for the bride to be or even single girls, if you want to make your own wedding cake why not try this Rose Wedding Cake game.
release_text: New version 3.0.0 * For this version we doubled everything to decor your favorite wedding cake. * We doubled the cake color, side cake decorations, trimming decoration, every flowers paterns and additional decorations. * You can choose between a round or square cake. New version 2.0.0 * We redid the entire game to have a better gaming experience. * You can now choose 3 times more cake colors. * Many side cake decoration added. * Lots of rose have been added in that cake game.

How to buy an application, visit the http://4pda.ru/forum/index.php?showtopic=137860 Before buying program suggested to try the free lessons. Differences between full version of the free lessons: ✔ All lessons are gathered in one application ✔ exam passed themes ✔ The independent operation of multiple users ✔ Customize difficulty level ✔ Counting personal user statistics ✔ Ability to sync score between devices ✔ Ability to connect to VKontakte and Google+ ATTENTION! The application contains the following built-buy: ★ Voice input ($ 0.99) • Designed for practicing pronunciation. • Helps to relieve psychological block that prevents to communicate in a foreign language • Helps to get rid of the accent • Built-in voice input (the keyboard) is available free of charge. ★ Open lesson ($ 0.99) • For those who want to start learning from the first lesson. ★ Unlock all classes ($ 4.99) • For those who want to determine the order of learning itself. How it works? The program offers simple expressions in Russian. From the words on the screen you need to make an English translation. If you answer correctly, the program will praise you. If you suddenly make a mistake - will prompt the right answer. As you compose your reply, selected words sounded. Then, the correct answer is announced. To move to the next lesson you need to dial 4.5 points in the previous lesson. While no points are recruited, the lessons remain locked. How are the scores? The program remembers the last 100 responses, number of correct answers divided by 100 and multiplied by 5. To gain 4.5 points need to answer correctly 90 questions out of 100. Too easy? Then switch settings increased level of complexity. The program will not offer you variants of words and asked to enter a proposal from the keyboard. EXAM The exam is designed to consolidate the knowledge of lessons learned. Also, it is well suited to refresh knowledge. Each lesson is 10 selected tasks. All tasks are mixed and offer to perform in random order. The program stores the results of each of the lessons in the exam. Upon completion of the exam exhibit an overall assessment and evaluation of each lesson. Do not be discouraged if the first time you did not receive the highest rating. It's just a reminder that the need to further work out the appropriate lesson. After all, the main purpose of this application to help you learn English and not exhibiting assessment exam. If you know how to improve the program, please contact us! We VKontakte: http://vk.com/polyglotmobile

description: It is a world clock app to display instantaneously the current time around the world . You can check the time of the place just to touch the location you want to know the time in the world map . Search of place are possible as country and region names , even from the time zone , where you want to frequently check the time can be registered as a ( local favorite ) . I can be checked with the position on the world map time zone country in the world , city name , national flag , time, and GMT. ★ display method of the time in the world are two types . (1) Touching the map of the world . When you touch a world map , where you want to know the time, the time of the location is displayed as a digital clock . Time will be displayed along with the national flag , and the like region name . (2) To choose from Name of country or region name list . Register as a ( local favorite ) Select the area you want to display the clock from the region name list of the world . Areas that have been registered will be added already listed , the time is displayed as the digital clock from the world map by touching it . Region name list is sorted Sort possible English alphabetical order , in the GMT time zone order. My favorite area can not add more than three places . ※ The number of regional World Clock World Time Map can display time is 90 places . ※ For convenience of display , world map displayed has been expanded about 1.3 times in the machine .

Fitness Tracker is an easy to use app for people of all ages who would like to improve their health by setting up their individual weight loss and exercise plan of action. Whether you wish to lose weight through diet or gain weight by bulking this app is right for you. With help from the unique “Before and After” photo feature you'll be able to visually track your progress! It is the FIRST Android App to offer this seamless, Before and After scrolling photo function! Fitness Tracker also offers many useful tools such as Body Mass Index BMI calculator, Waist to Height ratio WTH calculator, Resting Metabolic Rate RMR calculator, Basal Metabolic Rate BMR calculator and much more. Nothing to learn with this app – it’s all intuitive. You’re up and running in less than a minute. Unlike many other complicated health and fitness apps, Fitness Tracker keeps to the basics and may just be all you really need! Fitness Trackers 60 Second Plan 1. Quickly enter your age / weight / height / waist data 2. Select your target weight 3. Pick which level of exercise you wish – five choices – from little to none to heavy exercise. And you decide how many times per week you plan to workout. Fitness Trackers 60 Seconds Per day • Enter the estimated # calories you ate for that day • Enter the # minutes you exercised for that day (if applicable) Then Fitness Tracker does the rest! Features • Sums it all up in a “What You Need To Do” section with advice on adjusting daily calories and weekly workouts in order to reach your goal • Gives estimated dates to reach your goals • Provides recommendations for daily calories, proteins, carbohydrates, and fats • Take a photo, crop it, save it and it’s stamped with your weight and date • First of its kind “Before and After” photos let you see your weight and exercise progress • Auto calculates calories burned, Body Mass Index (BMI), Waist to Height ratio (WTH), Resting Metabolic Rate (RMR), and Basal Metabolic Rate (BMR) • Shows history data on weight, calories, and workouts • Includes a trend chart to show your progress over time • You can post to Facebook • Invites user feedback • BMI Calculator • Optional and flexible notifications • Super simple and very effective! Whether you are into sports, looking to lower cholesterol, looking for an easy to use BMI Calculator or just someone who occasionally runs on a treadmill our application has a progressive fitness plan tailored to meet your individual health goals. You can also use the Before and After photo feature to track your progress. ------------------------------------------------- DISCLAIMER: This Android application is provided for information purposes only. The information is NOT a substitute for professional medical care by a qualified doctor or other healthcare professional. ALWAYS check with your doctor if you have any concerns about your condition or treatment. The Fitness Tracker team and all those associated with its development are not responsible or liable, directly, indirectly on consequentially, for ANY form of damages whatsoever resulting from the use (or misuse) of information contained in or implied by the information in this application. Fitness Tracker makes no representations, warranties, or assurances as to the accuracy, currency or completeness of the BMI Calculator or any other content contained in this application. At any time, Fitness Tracker reserves the right to change the terms, conditions, and notices under which this application is offered. All individuals and corporations associated with this application accept no responsibility whatsoever and will not be liable for any losses, claims or damages which may arise from the use, download, or installation of this application. By downloading and/or using this application, all users and representatives agree to these terms and conditions.

description: Berlin is a fantastic city for public transport and if this is your first visit then you are in for a real treat. The transport authorities have created one of the most efficient, clean, safe, punctual and low cost public transport systems anywhere in the world. For just 35 Euros you can travel direct from Shönefeld Flughafen (airport) and go anywhere in the city (night or day) on the S-Bahn (mainly overground), U-Bahn (mainly underground) and any of the tram services (mainly in the east of the city) for 5 days without spending another cent. The stations are clean modern and very easy to navigate (even if you don't speak German) especially as they work on a trust system and hence have no ticket barriers to hold you up (Transport For London please take note). The trains and trams are clean, modern, roomy and frequent. This unique map is drawn by professionals and is the only map available with both the U-Bahn, S-Bahn and all the Tram services on one map. Riding the trams in the east is a great way to see and appreciate that part of the city. Travel Tip - There is lots to see and do in Berlin and we think it is fast becoming the European city to visit but if you really want to make the most of it then make sure you get yourself a "Berlin Welcome" travel card at the airport and along with this app you will be ready to travel anywhere in the city. ● KEY FEATURES ● ● Colourful clear map with major geographical features and places of interest. Unique to this app the map also shows the route of the old Berlin wall so you can better understand how the city was once divided. ● View the map, look up places of interest, plan your journey, etc all without an internet connection. ● Another unique feature is the "Minute Map" feature which provides a view of travel times to any location on the map. ● Route text itinerary with step by step instructions so you can easily locate the platform and train or tram you need. ● Easily locate your nearest transport stop. ● OVERVIEW ● The Berlin Metro - Map and route planner by Zuti makes it easy to travel in and around Berlin using the S Bahn (mainly overground), U Bahn (mainly underground) and any of the tram services. The application contains a professionally drawn map and route planner with many unique features. ● MINUTE MAP ● The unique Minute Map feature provides a view of travel times from any location on the map. This is helpful for getting a sense of scale and connectivity of the transport system and can provide some interesting results. ● ROUTING ● The application does not require an internet connection and will always be available to display a clear and detailed view of the city transport systems, plus list and animate the optimum route for your journey. Comprehensive details of your planned route are provided, including “direction”, “towards” and “service frequency” information (not available on any other offline journey planner) for example “Take the U2 towards Ruhleben for 14 mins (5 stops). Service runs every 5 minutes” which is essential when finding the correct platform and direction. Also given are alternatives for each leg of the journey. ● NO INTERNET CONNECTION REQUIRED ● The map and routing do not require an internet connection and you will not be charged data connection fees. This means the application saves on battery power and runs perfectly underground, on an aeroplane, etc. For international visitors to a city who have data roaming turned off this is an ideal solution.

Gamesofa Website: http://www.gamesofa.com More Games: http://www.gamesofa.com/mobile/ 【牌友最多嘅香港麻雀—華麗登場】 ★ 最正宗香港麻雀遊戲免費玩 ★ 贈幣超多：新手登入送1200神幣 ★ 各種底台麻雀局，想打多大就大打多大 ─ 神來也13張麻雀(Hong Kong Mahjong Game)遊戲特色 ─ ☆ 香港麻雀、廣東麻雀，玩法多樣！ ☆ 連線品質升級，2,300萬註冊玩家，打麻雀開檯最快！ ☆ 一指出牌，操作直覺流暢，手感真實，爽度UP！ ☆ 首創一手局(1/4圈)，3分鐘打一舖，臨時有事也不怕！ ☆ 粵語配音、高清畫面，VIP級體驗！ ☆ 認證會員每日免費補幣至888！ ☆ 免註冊，遊客帳號直接玩！ ─ 神來也十三張麻雀(Hong Kong Mahjong Game)改版內容 ─ ★ 財源滾滾，天天登入領紅包！ ★ 新增牌桌，除舊佈新財神到！ ★ 常勝軍、千人斬，閃亮稱號等你拿！ ★ 免註冊，遊客帳號直接玩！ ─神來也香港麻雀遊戲規則 ─ ☆ 一副麻雀總共144張，包含「萬子」，一萬到九萬，共36張；「筒子」，一筒到九筒，共36張；「條子」，一條到九條，共36張及28張「字牌」和8張「花牌」 ☆ 一副手牌14張(不含花牌、槓牌逾張)組成4副完成的順子、坎子或槓子與一對將眼。 ☆ 手牌之明暗牌與他人之捨牌(含加槓)或本身之摸牌組成五個完成之搭子及一對將眼時，宣告和牌，前者稱為和銃，後者稱為自摸。此外，非為「五搭一對」之特殊和牌包括、八仙過海、七搶一等， 但須恰為4張(不計花牌與槓牌逾張) ☆ 詳細麻雀遊戲玩法圖說及廣東麻雀及港式麻雀番數計算方式請參考: http://www.gamesofa.com/13mj/?op=rule_guide&topic=list2_2 ─ 其他說明 ─ 。原「神來也會員」或「Facebook」、「Yahoo」帳號直接玩 。若您之前使用MSN, Google等帳號登入神來也遊戲，想在手機上繼續使用該帳號，請參考「帳號轉換及登入教學說明」 http://www.gamesofa.com/13mjapp/?op=guide ======================= Gamesofa 五分鐘，想樂最輕鬆 ======================= 想玩更多？ Gamesofa 官網 http://www.gamesofa.com 更多神來也遊戲 http://www.gamesofa.com/mobile/ 玩家評鑑五顆星，線上免費麻雀遊戲品牌No.1！ 2300萬註冊玩家，3秒上桌、隨上隨練！超刺激香港麻雀，節奏快，更爽快！時想打麻雀，口袋就有麻將桌。

description: The hit game series with over 150 million plays is here! Hanger is a ragdoll physics swinging game where anything can happen! It's like Spider Man meets Happy Wheels! Use your rope to swing your way through each level but try not to lose any limbs along the way! Enjoy the incredible realistic ragdoll physics and rope swinging mechanics with smooth and responsive controls that's miles ahead of all other rope swinging games out there! Unlock cool new characters as you swing along like Tarzan, The Tarantula, Robotto, Zombie Grrrl and more! - 75+ levels with different themes! - Choose your character and unlock more! - Normal and Endless Game modes! - Catchy soundtrack by Boy vs Bacteria! - Challenge Mode with different challenges! - Swing through the levels Spider Man style! - Unlock new Endless Levels and Levelpacks! - Super smooth ragdoll physics gameplay! - No IAP purchases! "Sometimes you just want something that's fast, easy to play, but still has something to offer on the production side and has a cool mechanic, I think this is it." - Toucharcade.com "Hanger’s fundamental gameplay is very good and its weird, dark bent is intriguing." - 148apps.com "Hanger is the perfect time waster to pull out between quick tasks, or to compete with friends or family." - driodnerds.com "Thanks to its immaculate gameplay and terrific art style, Hanger is a worthy addition for any casual or hardcore gamer." - Apptudes.com “Hanger is worth checking out. It’s fun, fast and even a little off-putting in a horror movie kind of way.” - Appolicious.com ** This is the free ad-supported version of Hanger without any IAP! Please buy the premium version if you want to get rid of the ads! **
release_text: Tweaks and fixes! Also, we have listened to your feedback and the Hangers are now stronger than ever! (meaning that the body parts don't fall of as easy as before :) Keep on swinging & Like us on Facebook :) https://www.facebook.com/ASmallGame

description: Bored with popular, easy square puzzles? You have to check this one. Amazing Leonardo Da Vinci art and piece shapes like in real Puzzle! Based on Gr8 Puzzle engine. The most realistic and challenging jigsaw puzzle engine in the Market. No other puzzles for Android have so realistic shapes! Only in Gr8 Puzzle engine based sets every piece has a different shape, just like in real jigsaw puzzles! Try it! The most realistic and the most challenging jigsaw puzzle in the market. - 39 levels - up to 100 pieces - 5 difficulty levels - Every piece has a different shape (like in real puzzle) - Smooth rotation - Zoom in/out (+pinch zoom) - Unlimited game space - Stores your best time and world best time of solving - hardware acceleration (optional) See also other puzzle sets based on Gr8 Puzzle Engine.

NOTE : Application pour un format tablette. Elle fonctionne cependant sur un smartphone en mode paysage. Education CM2 est une application dédiée aux enfants. Elle leur permet d’approfondir leurs connaissances en lien avec les apprentissages du cycle 3 de l’école élémentaire française (CE2 - CM1- CM2). Cette application est la plus ludique possible pour les enfants tout en ayant des contenus sérieux et instructifs. Points forts : - 700 questions dans les domaines scolaires et plus de 150 questions de divertissement. - Des questions choisies et rédigées par une professeure des écoles, en lien avec les programmes de l’Education Nationale. - Une partie scolaire avec des questions en maths, français, histoire et géographie classées par niveau de classe. - Une partie divertissement comprenant des questions sur le sport, la musique, les drapeaux et la langue anglaise. - A chaque bonne réponse, l'enfant gagne une pièce d'or. L'ensemble de ses gains lui permettront d'acheter virtuellement des compagnons. NOTE: Application for a tablet format. However, it works on a smartphone in landscape mode. Education CM2 is dedicated to children application. It allows them to deepen their knowledge in relation to the learning cycle 3 French elementary school (CE2 - CM1-CM2). This application is the most fun possible for children while having serious and informative content. Strengths: - 700 subjects in school areas and more than 150 issues of entertainment. - Questions selected and written by a teacher schools, related programs of National Education. - A school with some questions in math, French, history and geography classified by grade level. - Some entertainment including questions on sports, music, flags and English. - For each correct answer, the child wins a gold coin. All his gains he will buy virtually companions.

description: A two in one shopping estimator and list. Press a combination of buttons to quickly add the approximate value of each item you put in your basket keeping a rough total. Auto memory to add the last item combination again. Switch to the list tab and see your shopping list, crossing off items as you add them to your basket. Items are grouped into categories. You can create/edit categories and change the order they appear to match the layout of your store. Favourites list so you can add items you regularly shop for without typing them in again. Optional vibrate on sum button/list presses to give you positive feedback as you are shopping and forced portrait or landscape options to stop phone auto-rotation as you are carrying it. If the sum value's do not suit your currency you can now edit the 4 buttons. Share your shopping list via email/message or any other share action you have available. If you have questions/issues please use the contact developer link to send an email. If you encounter a force close please use the report button, it provides valuable information for a fix to be found quickly. If you would like to help translate Grocery Sum to your own language please contribute here http://www.getlocalization.com/GrocerySum/

TOP SELLING HIDDEN OBJECT GAME ON GOOGLE PLAY! Join the mysterious Secret Society and explore numerous enchanting worlds! The Secret Society is a clandestine community of people with the unique ability to move through magic worlds. Your dear Uncle Richard, an elite member of this ancient order, has suddenly gone missing. After a period of despair, you realize that you too are blessed with these special powers and thus are the only one that can find him! Locate your beloved uncle, protect the sacred Artifact of the Order and thwart the forces threatening the entire society in this fantastic blend of hidden object tasks and puzzles! YOU CAN UNLOCK ADDITIONAL BONUSES VIA IN-APP PURCHASE FROM WITHIN THE GAME! ● Nearly 2102 quests to keep you entertained for months ● 30 amazing locations full of interesting characters ● 317+ сollections of hidden objects to piece together ● Gem Match mini-game: swap and match gems to get 3 in a row! ● Ingenious mini-games puzzles wrapped in mystery ● Regular updates with additional quests and more ● Google Play game services support ____________________________ Game available in: English, Chinese, Traditional Chinese, French, German, Italian, Japanese, Korean, Brazilian Portuguese, Portuguese, Russian, Spanish ____________________________ COMPATIBILITY NOTES: ***Note*** This game supports high-end smartphones and tablets such as Nexus 7 and Nexus 10. ____________________________ © 2013-2014 MyTona LLC. Published by G5 Entertainment AB. ____________________________ VISIT US: www.g5e.com WATCH US: www.youtube.com/g5enter FIND US: www.facebook.com/g5games FOLLOW US: www.twitter.com/g5games
release_text: The Secret Society is throwing a glorious party — and you’re invited! Download this festive update and enjoy special gifts! NEW HIDDEN OBJECT SCENE – Explore the exquisite Banquet Hall! TIME TO PARTY – Master tricky quests, complete special collections and solve the Gem Match puzzle during this exciting event! A Lunch Chest, Solemnity Talisman and unique Avatar await you! 105 NEW QUESTS – Tackle them all to refine your skills! NEW COLLECTIONS – Gather 16 collections and claim your rewards!

description: 액션 당구-X는 실제 당구의 느낌을 최대한 살리도록 만들었습니다. 구력(다마수) 200 넘으시는 분들도 실제와 같이 즐길수 있도록 만들었습니다. 국내외 몇 안되는 찍어치기(마세이)와 AI-대전/온라인-대전 모드를 지원합니다. ( 무료지만 광고가 없어서 편하게 즐길실 수 있습니다 ^^ ) 4구 국내식 중대 / 국제식 중대 3구 국제식 중대 / 국제식 대대 당구대와 당구공의 비율을 적용, 스핀과 쿠션의 느낌을 실제 당구와 유사하게 구현하였습니다. 끊어치기-스트로크, 밀어치기-스트로크, 찍어치기-스트로크(마세이)까지 3가지가 구현되어 있습니다. 게임 모드는 현재 '혼자하기', '멀티-플레이', 'AI-대전', '연습하기', '튜토리얼' 5가지 모드를 지원합니다. 1. ALONE PLAY (혼자하기) - 같이 있는 친구와 단말기 한대로 번갈아가며 대전할 수 있습니다. - 30~2000 까지 '수지'를 선택해서 플레이 할 수 있어요. - 메뉴의 'UNDO'를 통해 '물리기'가 가능해서 다시 칠 수 있어요. - 왼쪽 패널의 카메라 버튼을 이용해서 '리플레이 보기' 기능으로 혼자서나 서로의 샷을 분석 할 수 있어요. 2. MULTI PLAY (멀티-플레이) - 다른 기기와 블루투스로 1대1 네트워크 온라인 대전할 수 있습니다. - 10미터 이내의 범위에서 1대1 네트워크 온라인 대전을 해 보세요! - 반드시 '주인/1P'와 '손님/2P' 이렇게 두대의 기기를 각각 선택후 플레이해야합니다. 3.AI PLAY (AI-대전) - 30~2000 실력의 다양한 AI와 대전 할 수 있습니다. - 대전 결과에 따라 플레이어의 온라인 랭킹이 전체 플레이어 랭킹 보드에 적용이 됩니다. - 중도 포기 없이 AI와 한판 완료시 랭킹 스코어가 부여됩니다. (랭킹에 영향을 줌) 4. PRACTICE (연습모드) - 3구/4구를 무제한으로 마음껏 연습하실 수 있습니다. - '연습모드'에서는 당구공을 손으로 누르면 안내선에 따라 공의 위치를 사용자 임의로 변경 할 수 있습니다. - 메뉴의 'UNDO' 기능을 통해 '다시치기'와 왼쪽 패널의 카메라 버튼을 이용해서 '리플레이 보기' 기능으로 집중 연습을 할 수 있습니다. - 'AI버튼'을 누르면 자신의 현재 '수지'와 설정한 스트로크에 맞는 AI를 찾아서 샷을 합니다. - 프로 선수들의 예술구를 따라해 보세요~! 5. TUTORIAL (튜토리얼) - 체계적인 튜토리얼 항목을 따라가며 기본적인 '액션 당구-X'의 게임 조작 방법을 배울 수 있어요. 6. RULES (게임규칙) - 각각의 게임 메뉴의 'RULES' 버튼을 눌려 당구대를 선택해서 게임을 즐길수 있습니다. 7. 옵션에서 게임 기능 설정: - 공 두께 보기 : on / off - 자동 테이블 회전 (스트로크하기 좋은 위치로) : on / off - 게임 처음 시작할때 도움말 보기(처음 한번 보게되면 자동으로 옵션이 꺼짐) : on / off - 게임 안에서 이펙트(공끼리 충돌시 효과 표현) 보기 : on / off - 테이블 터치해서 큐대 회전 기능 : on / off 8. 주의 사항: - 정식-계정으로 전환하시면 지금까지 기록하신 모든 전적과 랭킹, 스코어가 본인 만의 계정정보(ID/비밀번호)를 통해서 관리가 가능하므로 지금의 임시-계정에서 '꼭 정식-계정으로 전환'하시길 부탁드립니다. - 정식-계정 전환 방법: 'PLAYER INFO'에 있는 'ACCOUNT INFO'에 들어가셔서 'CHANGE OFFICIAL ID' 버튼을 이용해 정식-계정 전환 가능 - 기기 변경시나 기기 포멧할때 본 어플(앱)을 깔고 나서 기존에 사용하시던 계정정보를 입력하시면 모든 기록이 복구됩니다. - 비밀번호를 분실했을 경우 정식-계정으로 회원 전환할때 입력한 ID와 E-Mail주소를 adrian.gamebox@gmail.com 으로 알려주시면 등록했던 E-Mail주소로 임시 비밀번호를 발급해 드리겠습니다. 9. 향후 지원되는: < 온라인 대전과 아이템샵 >을 통해 유저의 각 레벨과 아이템 능력치에 따라 다양한 플레이를 즐길 수 있고 실력 향상을 통한 레벨 업은 물론 랭킹을 통해 자신의 실력은 뽐내 보세요! 10. 참고 사항: - 아직 정상적인 서비스 전이라 '서버'나 '기타 문제'로 "AI와의 대전 결과"가 랭킹에 잘 반영되지 않을 수 있습니다. 이점 양해 부탁드립니다. (전적이나 사용자 데이터 초기화됨) 2. 안드로이드 롤리팝(5.1) 지원. 3. 최소 지원 안드로이드 버젼이 이클레어(2.1)에서 진저브레드(2.3.3)으로 상향. 4. 대전을 위한 서버 작업으로 인해 서버 접속이 되지 않습니다. 5. 인터넷 '온라인 대전 모드'가 지원될 예정. 6. 아이템 플레이, 포켓볼(9볼/8볼/8볼uk)도 지원될 예정.

description: Over 20 million people use Bloglovin’ to discover and read blogs in fashion, food, DIY, travel and more! Never miss a post from your favorite bloggers again, whether you're at home or on the go. Bloglovin’ is a simple way to read blogs and share post; it's fast and fun! Bloglovin’ helps you to keep up with your favorite bloggers and Youtube vloggers like The Sartorialist, Cashmere & Cupcakes, Michelle Phan and millions more. Bloglovin’ has every kind of blog you'd want to read, whether its a Wordpress, Blogger, Squarespace or Tumblr blog. - Follow all of your favorite blogs and see all of their posts and videos in a beautiful feed - Discover new blogs and bloggers through both social and curated channels - Save articles, fashion ideas, DIY craft instructions, and recipes to read later -Share posts and video with your family and friends Whatever your passions may be, discover the best blogs for your interests. Get inspiration from top fashion, food, DIY, home decor, travel and fitness bloggers. Find us online! Website: http://www.bloglovin.com Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Bloglovin Twitter: https://twitter.com/bloglovin Instagram: http://instagram.com/bloglovin Pinterest: https://www.pinterest.com/bloglovin/ To learn more about Bloglovin’, visit us at: http://www.bloglovin.com/what-is-bloglovin If you are having technical issues or have any questions, please visit us at help.bloglovin.com
release_text: • Fixed unexpected crash when reading blog post • Fixed unexpected crash when sign in • Fixed unexpected empty feed • Other minor improvements for loading speed. • We heard your feedback and have made oodles of performance enhancements

description: Greece GuideWithMe is an offline travel guide, which recommends detailed articles around the country in relation to your current location. Developed by travelers and for travelers, GuideWithMe is a rich source of general travel info as well as off the beaten track advice. Get around guides, phrase lists, warnings how to stay safe and healthy, restaurants and hotel recommendations, local costs and taxes, road rules and a variety of other info are carefully stored in one app. ­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­ • USE OFFLINE. Save money on roaming fees and refer to the articles even if you are offline and cellular data is not available. • DISCOVER ARTICLES RELATIVE TO YOUR LOCATION. Switch between country, region, city, travel topic articles recommended for your travel destination and current location. Greece travel guide contains around 260 articles covering the whole country. • GET RELIABLE INFO. All info comes from wikivoyage project, which is constantly updated by adventurous travelers and aspiring writers. Articles are vividly illustrated with more than 260 well­chosen pictures and images. • VIEW ON THE MAP. GuideWithMe is based on map data, provided by MAPS.ME, offline maps app. An option to view the place on offline map is offered. ­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­ We are waiting for any advice and feedback about GuideWithMe app. This will help to suit GuideWithMe app to your expectations and tastes. Your reviews and ratings are always welcome. Send them to android@guidewithme.com or leave a feedback in Google Play review section. Check out our travel guides: http://guidewithme.com/ Follow us! Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/guidewithme Google +: http://plus.google.com/+Guidewithme/ Twitter: @GuideWithMe Enjoy your travels! IMPORTANT: currently the app is available only in the English language.
release_text: ● Updated articles and images from wikivoyage ● Fixed minor issues

description: Study for the GMAT with Magoosh’s video lessons app. Learn all the math, verbal, writing and integrated reasoning you need to know to beat the GMAT. Our thousands of students have improved their scores by an average of over 50 points and we guarantee you will too. ☞ Over 200 animated lessons (22 hours of audio and video) ☞ Covers all four sections (math, verbal, writing, and integrated reasoning) ☞ Track your progress as you study ☞ Watch professional tutors solve practice problems ☞ Detailed explanation of every concept on the GMAT This free app provides access to a large sample of Magoosh’s popular lessons. Sign in with a Magoosh Premium account to get access to the full library, along with online practice questions and the rest of Magoosh’s GMAT prep program. See http://gmat.magoosh.com for more information. Who makes the lessons? === Magoosh’s expert tutors, Chris Lele, Dave Scalise, Brent Hanneson, and Mike McGarry. Each tutor has over a decade of experience teaching thousands of students in a variety of subjects. They’re awesome people too! What is Magoosh? === Magoosh is an online test prep company with a focus on teaching through videos and personalized customer support. The Magoosh team blogs about book reviews (like Manhattan GMAT), idioms, formulas, grammar, sentence correction, problem solving, GMAT study guides other study tips & strategies to add to your GMAT toolkit. Articles from the blog have been compiled into an ebook with over 3,000 downloads and more articles are added every day. Check it out at http://magoosh.com/gmat What about practice questions? === When you’re ready to practice for the full GMAT test, Magoosh’s full website has more than 700 excellent GMAT Math, GMAT Verbal and Integrated Reasoning practice questions, each with its own detailed video explanation. Take quizzes with timers, watch the videos and analyze your results. See http://gmat.magoosh.com for more information. How do I contact you? === Customer satisfaction is incredibly important to us. If you have any questions or comments, please send us an email at help@magoosh.com or call 1-855-MAGOOSH and we’ll get back to you as quickly as we can. If you’re outside the US, you can also reach us at +1-510-214-0212 Our students love Magoosh (we’re tied for highest rating on GMAT Club). Here are a few things they’ve said: “The instructional videos are brilliant, I really appreciated having the flexibility to pause a video, absorb the information and re-play it if I needed to.” “The Magoosh staff was awesome; I peppered them with questions and requests and they always responded thoroughly and quickly.” “Magoosh made it possible for me to succeed on the test in a short period of time. I looked at Kaplan, Barron’s, and Princeton Review products, and I can confidently say that Magoosh was definitely the best.” “Magoosh is the only reason why I haven’t lost my sanity.” “The team is really great and actually cares about your score as much as they would care about their own. Simply the best.” Don’t wait until the last minute to start studying, let us be your study guide and download Magoosh GMAT Prep today! Disclaimer: GMAT® is a registered trademark of the Graduate Management Admission Council®. The Graduate Management Admission Council® does not endorse, nor is it affiliated in any way with the owner or any content of this app.

Lead King Thorund the Wurmhewer and his clan of Dwarves against the surging Goblin uprising! Learn Chess the fun and easy way through unique challenges in single player campaign as your Dwarves face Warg Riders, Goblin Raiders, Cannon Trolls, bombs, mortars, and traps! Then challenge yourself in Online Player vs Player (PvP) as either the Dwarven or Goblin army! The first game of its kind, Dwarven Chess uses the addictive core of Chess combined with 3D fantasy pieces, boards, backgrounds and alternate moves to unleash new strategies in this ancient game! Great for players ages 9-90, levels based on Minesweeper, Sobokan, naval battles, and outpost sieges introduce new players to the fun challenge of Chess, but varying difficulty levels will challenge the masters! =FEATURES= - FREE TO PLAY! - Dwarven Campaign: 8 unique challenges with 24 levels! - Goblin Campaign: 7 unique challenges with 23 levels!* - 30 unique 3D Characters - 15 unique 3D Backgrounds - Table-top mode in Standard and Dwarven rules Chess - Play vs the computer AI in Standard or "Dwarven Rules" Chess - Play online player vs player in Standard or "Dwarven Rules" Chess!!! - If you like The Hobbit, Game of Thrones, and Lord of the Rings, you'll love Dwarven Chess!!!! - Possibly the most in- depth Chess Variant the app world has ever seen!!!! - *Goblin Campaign is an in-app purchase From some people who like us: "VERY COOL! I have only played the first few levels, but as a player of rpgs and chess, this is really unique and fun. Great job devs!" "Unbelievable Really, I love it. Congratulations for your idea, very well idea :)" "Excellent I like it, it is unique not the usual chess games" "It has LOADS of pieces so I will DEFINITELY put down 5 stars!" "Great game! None to complain about!" "Awesome Loved the game only thing that could make it better is more armies but all up probably best chess game I've ever played" Dwarven Chess is not just a puzzle game, strategy game, or Chess game- it's all 3 in one! Play your own unique strategy in multiplayer online battles against other chess opponents, or simply switch to Classic Mode and play a standard 3D Chess game. Participate in the storyline war as the Dwarves are suddenly attacked by goblin uprisings, or reverse the tables and play as the goblin army and wage war on the Dwarves! (Goblin Campaign is an in-app purchase). Some levels require strategic tactics to defend the Dwarves, while others are puzzles based on Sobokan and Mine Sweeper. For Chess enthusiasts, see what it is like to not follow classic openings and moves, but to meet new challenges in this "Chess Variant" with environmental obstacles and situational advantages for your AI opponent. Face bomb-throwing Goblins as you help the Dwarven King escape, and set traps in the Dwarven Bear Camp as you defend it from a goblin patrol! Free to play, "Dwarven Chess Free" is filled with HD quality art, forming over 30 unique pieces all with unique moves from standard Chess. While the download is quite large, "Dwarven Chess Lite" has lower quality graphics, but all the same gameplay with less than half the memory used. 15 different 3D backgrounds and boards make each new challenge something to see, with 3 to 5 levels for each challenge. Face the Ice Ogres and Trolls with your Dwarven Scout Pawns and Bear Rider Knights- all in just one of these glorious challenges! Dwarven Chess is not just for Chess players, but for all fans of fantasy, strategy games, Role-playing games (RPGs), Trading card games (TCGs), puzzle games, board games, and even action and adventure game fans will find fun in all that Dwarven Chess has to offer :)

Default android screen full of app icons is too much to handle sometimes. Even if you place apps in categorized folders, you spend ~10 seconds in locating that folder on screen when you need it. Here's an awesome and beautiful alternative to that. Pages UCCW Theme. == FEATURES == * 5 screens. Each screen dedicated to one category of apps. Favorites, Communication, Social, Media, Tools. * Each screen holds 4 app cards. 26 cards to choose from. * Each app card has one editable hotspot. Assign your favorite app to them. * 1 special screen to hold your other widgets. * Jump from any screen to any other screen easily by tapping the category buttons at the left of each screen. * No special wallpapers needed. Any white wallpaper will do. == INSTRUCTIONS == READ BEFORE BUYING == To use this skin, you have to install, apply and optionally edit/assign hotspots to the skin. Install - * After downloading the skin app from play store, launch it. * Tap "Install Skin" button in the app. * Tap "Ok" when it asks you whether you want to replace app. This step is replacing the skin installer with the actual skin. OR * If you are using a KitKat device, it'll ask whether you want to update the existing app. * Tap "Install". When that finishes, tap "Done". Skin is now installed. Apply - You must have latest version of Ultimate custom widget (UCCW) installed. http://goo.gl/eDQjG Follow APPLY and rest of the instructions from this page - http://iwiz-vicky.blogspot.com/2013/02/pages-theme-for-android.html Watch the setup instructions in the attached video. == TIPS / TROUBLESHOOT == * If the "Install" step fails; go to Android settings > Security and make sure "Unknown sources" is enabled. Reason explained here - http://wizardworkapps.blogspot.com/2013/12/ultimate-custom-widgets-uccw-tutorial.html * To change temperature unit between Celsius and Fahrenheit -> Launch UCCW app itself. Tap Menu, tap settings. Here, if "Celsius" is marked, temperature will display in Celsius. If unmarked, Fahrenheit. * If weather info is not displayed/updated, Launch UCCW app itself. Tap Menu, tap settings, tap location. Make sure "Auto location" is checked and that the third row is correctly showing your location. * You can also tap Menu, tap settings, tap 'weather provider' and change the selected provider. Mail me if you have ANY issues. bagarwa
release_text: v1.1 * App doesn't need any permission now. Yayy. * Easier to use. This is no longer a skin installer. This is the skin app itself. After update, the skin will be directly available to apply.

description: Explore the city of Ottawa! - Visualize most of the data sets available from Open Data Ottawa - Access "Ottawa Transit", and "Ottawa Recycle" services This app was created for the Apps4Ottawa contest. *** Requires Google Play services

description: With latest update Spy Camera will take hidden photos with maximum possible resolution. Take instant photos with silent Spy Camera! Capture your friends when they are not posing! Use hardware volume buttons to take hidden photo! There will be no preview, no sound and no flash during taking photo. After installation Spy Camera will appear among your applications named as SC (meaning Spy Camera). Launch Spy Camera. After it your screen will become black. To take photo press Volume Up or Volume Down buttons on your phone. To exit Spy Camera press Back button or Home button on your phone. The application can work in two modes. First mode is when the screen is black so it looks like your phune is off and second mode is when phone screen is on and shows wallpaper. To switch between these two modes go to the settings by pressing Menu button. Also in Settings it is possible to read Help with brief instructions of how to use Spy Camera and an option to show Help message after first launch of Spy Camera. All pictures taken with Spy Camera will appear on your SD card in folder named SpyCamera. Please, don't downvote if something doesn't work. Just write me an e-mail at triladroid@gmail.com and I'll try to help with all your problems!
release_text: Now all photos taken with Spy Camera will have the best possible resolution. In the future update there will be possibility to change folder name where photos taken with Spy Camera will be stored

description: Educative App for kids from 3 to 12 years old. With this amazing app they might learn, alphabet, words, numbers, counting, vegetables, animals, fruits, and play several kids games. description: APERTURE LABORATORIES proudly presents Logo Me. With the Logo Me application you can conveniently change your device's bootlogo (not bootanimation) to a custom image with just a few simple clicks. You can secure your custom logo with a numeric lock code (up to 9 digits). Changing or restoring the logo will only be possible after the lock code has been entered. This will allow you to tag your device by including your name and contact info on your custom bootlogo. In case your device gets stolen the thief will be having a hard time selling it. Also if you lose your device the finder will know how to contact you. This application onlys work with the Galaxy Nexus GSM (maguro), Verizon (toro) and Sprint (toroplus). **** IMPORTANT **** Some custom ROMs come with a broken version of su and/or busybox. If you experience any problems with the app, before reporting the issue first try to fix it by installing Stericson's busybox (https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=stericson.busybox) and SuperSU (https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=eu.chainfire.supersu) and then updating the su binary in the SuperSU app. The app uses the build properties to identify the device. If you mess with the properties the device detection will fail and the app will return the error that your device is not compatible. Use this application at your own risk. The author is not responsible for any damage resulting from the use of this app. You can also get this app on Android Pit which accepts Paypal and other payment options: http://www.androidpit.com/en/android/market/apps/app/aperture.ezekeel.logome/Logo-Me
release_text: * Added new launcher icon by John Xionidis.

description: 【姓名測試】是壹款根據古代河圖洛書之原理，開發台灣最熱門的九宮姓名學的軟體。經過妙樂老師鍥而不捨的努力，終於開發出此款APP，從您的姓名看您壹生事業、工作、財運、感情婚姻、姻緣桃花、流年運勢、男女配對合適度等。這是目前市場上最接近真人親算及最受好評的命理 APP之壹。 【姓名測試—九宮姓名學】特點： 1.名字是上天賜予的卦象，以古代河圖洛書為原理，以周易五行為基礎，從姓名准確探究人的壹生。 2.流年命宮，婚姻宮，還有未知的秘密，壹生的排盤等，壹看便知。 3.姓名配對，從姓名尋找兩人的緣分，感情不再徘徊迷茫，準確率達到99%。 4.了解自己，輕鬆知道適合自己的生活方向、提高巧遇貴人的機遇和發掘自己更多的潛能，揚長避短！ 5.更有適合自己的風水格局佈置，知命改命，更好地發展自己。 6.尋找和自己壹生機緣相近的歷史人物。 該測試方法不同於坊間的“宿命論”，而關注如何創造人生的價值，幫助您了解自己身上的優缺點，給予您建議不斷進行自我調整和提高，發揮自身優點，改善缺點，並了解目前自己的運勢軌道，積極運作！讓自己藉由經營、突破、改造來完善自己的人生，邁向成功，擺脫〝宿命論〞！ 你想改變你的人生嗎？歡迎您來體驗這套源自於中國老祖宗的智慧「洛書」所衍生出的學理「九宮氣」，應用在姓名上，讓您突破自己的人生。 更多命理資訊歡迎關注 靈機命理館 ： https://www.facebook.com/linghit

description: Farmdale is a wonderful story of friendly and happy farmers living in a dream land. As one of these cheerful citizens you can grow plants, take care of animals, cozy up your part of an incredible world and help your neighbors. You can do anything in Farmdale! Expand your farm, explore mysteries of this fantastic world. You may even find a hidden treasure! Please note that Farmdale is completely free to play, however some game items can also be purchased for real money. The game offers: - A magical world with characters who will tell you their exciting stories; - Cute animals that will need your care; - Hundreds of quests; - Dozens of plants and trees; - Production objects such as a kitchen, workshop, spinning wheel and many more; - Countless recipes; - Various buildings and improvements. PLAY FOR FREE Have a problem or want to ask a question? We will be glad to help! You can email us at android.support@farmdale.ru , or visit our Facebook page at https://www.facebook.com/Farmdale.news . You do not need to have an internet connection to play the game, though being connected does open several additional functions.

Find out who will become the winner! You can now own more animals! Animal costumes were given new and exciting names. Now it will be impossible to mistake them for the animals themselves; Several mistakes were reparied, pertaining to: Quests; Translations of several objects; Use of several recipes.

description: “Hungry Bugs: Kitchen Invasion” is the best free tapping game for everyone! Kitchen is the most tempting place, ha? Right, because we find there a lot of various goodies. But! We can also find there many little, hungry, mischievous bugs. They want to taste our delicious cake just like we do. But would you accept to see your cake being eaten by some bugs? I doubt it! So if you want to protect your sweet course and stop the bugs from devouring it, get ready to tap a lot. They are hungry, they are fast and they are endless. Start playing and see how much chocolate cake you can save. Give it a try and start playing right now! Don’t let those bugs ruin your dessert! Test how fast you are and how long you can keep the bugs away from your cake. Share your score, compare it with people from around the world and take your honorable place on the leader board! Defend your cake tenaciously, but remember that Fun is the most important part of the game! J Don’t hesitate too much, download the game Now and Enjoy! Also, let us know your feedback!! HIGHLIGHTED FEATURES: - ENDLESS FUN TIME; - EASY AND ENTERTAINING GAMEPLAY; - CUTE GRAPHICS; - GLOBAL LEADER BOARD; NEW DELICIOUS CAKES COMING SOON!!! STAY TUNED!
release_text: Increase your total score to open new goodies with unique gameplay. What's new: + New delicious goodies with unique gameplay; + New Christmas decorations added; + Game optimisation.

description: Application Dynamicznie is designated as a training tool supporting dynamic shooting practice, covering both practical and sport approaches. Dynamicznie computes score according to rules of IDPA or IPSC disciplines, basing on net time and achieved targets hits or manually entered points. Target icon on the main screen works as a button, and invokes detailed scoring screen. First results for a new course of fire should be entered manually (without using increment and decrement buttons), creating template for all next runs. Each time you enter detailed scoring screen, maximum possible hits is automatically entered into the aphas field, and you can enter your results simply increment rest of fields (charlies or deltas for example) if necessary. Note, that hit of no-shoot target is not automatically related to miss, thus incrementing no-shoot field does NOT decrement alpha field value. After completion of the training session, achieved scores can be sent by email (also in .csv format), in order to analyze results.
release_text: Corrected IPSC scoring related to no-shoot hits.

description: ►► ORIGINAL, MULTILINGUAL STORIES IN ENGLISH, FRENCH, GERMAN, SPANISH, RUSSIAN, AND UKRAINIAN! ◄◄ Hello! My name is Moka. I am a cuddly toy and I love telling stories. I love to write stories with simple words, that everybody can understand. And with lots of pictures! Because I love to draw. Fear not! My stories are not scary, but lots of fun and full of adventure. If you are between 2 and 10 years, my stories are for you! Today, I’m going to tell you the story of the vampire’s castle. But don't be afraid! You see, it's a story that ends well. Users have the choice of reading the story themselves, or hearing it read by a captivating narrator. This exciting story is brought to life with music, sound effects, and much more! ► FEATURES: Original stories for children Multilingual: English, French, German, Spanish, Russian, Ukrainian Narration ON/OFF Great illustrations Background music Do you have enough of always the same stories like Cinderella, The Sleeping Beauty, Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs, Rapunzel, Tom Thumb, Three little pigs, Little Thumbling, Little Red Riding Hood, Hansel and Gretel, William Tell...?? Try Moka's stories and fairy tales for children!
