description: Shows the currently playing track, album, and artist on the DashClock Widget NOTE: DashClock does not allow me to add buttons to the listing, so until support for that is added I will not be able to add play controls. Go to the settings to set what music player opens when you press the dashclock entry. Your player cannot be autodetected so it must be manually configured. Works with most music players. If your player does not work, try the suggestions below. If it still doesnt work then your player is not compatible because it does not broadcast out what its playing. Android 4.4+: Enable the Notification Listener setting to support any player that also supports the android lockscreen music controls. Android 4.3 and earlier: If your player has last.fm scrobbling support, enable that. If not, look for a setting to broadcast metadata and enable that. DashClock Music Extension requires DashClock Widget by Roman Nurik: http://www.google.com/url?q=https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=net.nurik.roman.dashclock Email any suggestions/issues to gonemadsoftware@gmail.com or visit the forums: http://gonemadmusicplayer.proboards.com/index.cgi?board=feedback Translations for the settings can be added here: http://www.getlocalization.com/DashClockMusicExtension/ PERMISSIONS: -com.android.vending.BILLING: Used for optional donations (in app purchase). This extension will always be 100% free but donations are welcome.
release_text: 2.2: -Fixed crash setting the default player -Updated target sdk to 21 (Android 5.0) Note: If the notification listener is not working, you might have to remove and readd the extension from being displayed in dashclock in order to start getting updates. Also if you are running 4.3 do not enable the notification listener. It only works on 4.4 and higher but google does not provide a way to hide it in 4.3

description: 7/25/2013 - Initial release of Pretty Sketchy Bro snowboarding game beta!!! **PSB Donate version has 4 unique mountains (work in progress)** Pretty Sketchy Bro is the newest snowboard game out there, with great riding physics and a free trick engine - no restrictions! 1080s, double corks, TRIPLE corks, grinds, butters, combos, you can do it all. Plus the new ragdoll physics make for some hilariously brutal crashes! You can help me finish this game up for release by playing it and giving feedback. This is just a beta version, meaning that a lot of things are not finished or polished yet, but the game is so much fun that I want to get it in your hands! There are 4 mountains available, with 4 run starting points each. Make it to the bottom of the hill and get the highest score you can, or just enjoy the ride. The mountain features are not complete yet, but that is something that I will improve with time by adding new jumps/rails with updates. I will be working on a career mode, with objectives and stats, and I will update this beta with that mode once it is ready :) Controls: This plays like a dual-joystick game on a touchscreen. Left side of the screen acts as the left joystick, and right is the right (pretty complicated, I know). Left joystick controls your movement, turning, spinning, and flipping. The right joystick is the crouch/jump button, and will allow you to do different grabs in the air, butter the board on the ground, or control the board while on a rail. To grind, just jump and land on a rail. It takes practice and you need to line up your hit so you don't slide off the rail too soon! Clicking the clock/score on the top left will reset your run. Clicking the top right will switch cameras, there are only two for now but I plan on having four. Clicking the top middle of the screen will throw a snowball, but watch out, they get big! MOGA Pro controller is supported! You should see a green highlighter on the main menu that you can use as the selector if the MOGA Pro is properly connected. Controls are similar to Amped for XBox, where grabs are done using the right joystick. Graphics: Sharp mobile graphics powered by the Unity3D Game Engine. Real time shadows are in this version, you just have to set the graphics to "EXTREME" or "awesome" from the main menu. Menu music: "Channel Surfing" by sumidiotdude Game music: "Parallel Diamonds" by hektikmusic Also, check out the website http://www.mmkprogramming.com You can actually play Pretty Sketchy Bro from the comfort of your PC/Mac browser! I will keep that version up to date with new features as well. FEATURES: *Free-rotating aerial tricks allows for the best looking corked rotations in a snowboard video game *Snow and board spray particle effects make it feel like you are in the game *Unique grinding/sliding system does not lock you on to rails, allows you to slide across them *6 grabs! Indy, Mute, Melon, Stalefish, Nose, and Tail grabs. Touching different areas on the right joystick while in air allows you to perform different grabs *Optional tilt controls using the accelerometer. Customizable sensitivity levels will be added soon for touchscreen and accelerometer *Half-pipe action! It is at Run 2 on Mountain 1. *Ragdoll crash physics! *Snowball fight! Just for fun, launch snowballs by touching the top center of the screen and they will grow into rolling balls of destruction before they magically disappear (unless you are riding one of them...) PLANNED FEATURES: *Full career mode with saved rider stats and progression *More mountains and more features *Multiplayer? *More - request features and I will consider them! Email me with any questions/comments at mmkprogramming@gmail.com . Enjoy the ride!
release_text: 0.005 - Beta 8/3/2013 Sorry for quick updates, hopefully this one fixes bug (ad-related). 0.003 - Beta 8/2/2013 Change ad size - Please click ad if you have nothing better to do! Fix for holding jump button while landing - now you stay crouched (thanks Anthony). Fix for crashing on rail->cannot get up (thanks Justin). Timer stops at end of run. 0.002 - Beta 7/26/2013 Fix for detecting if rider is on a rail or a snowball (yes, you can ride snowballs). Check mmkprogramming.com for full log.

description: Talk lets you convert text to voice using the Text-to-speech engine on your smartphone. It allows importing web pages directly from the browser to listen to them. You can also import selected text from other apps. Features: -Text to voice -Read web pages -Play / Pause / Stop -Export audio as WAV file -Lots of languages (internet connection required for some) Make your phone say anything you want in many languages! Let your phone read the news for you! There's a paid version available WITHOUT ADS here: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.abast.talkpro NOTE: Your phone must have a Text-to-Speech enginge for Talk to work. If it doesn't have it you can download it from Google Play. Depending on the TTS engine, some languages that appear in the app may not work. G+ community: https://plus.google.com/communities/107986392540899459664
release_text: New paid version available WITHOUT ADS -v1.60 huge update! Export audio as WAV (new permissions). The paragraph that's playing is highlighted. New progressbar, lets you scroll through paragraphs. Change pitch and speed. Tons of bug fixes. -v1.5x Pause when receiving calls (new permissions). Change text size. Progress bar. Keep screen on. Import from webpage improved (now support Flipboard & more). Fixed rotation bug.

description: This engaging game of skill is a mobile tutor for self-study of vocabulary and phonetics on the beginner’s (elementary, basic) level. The word list includes words from various topics used in everyday life. This self-teaching game helps to learn productively correct pronunciation and spelling through visual and audio support. The game consists of several stages so that the learning process is more efficient: • Training – learning the alphabet, nouns, adjectives, verbs with transcription through flashcards and sound accompaniment. • Language quiz - testing of the knowledge of the words happens through fun and simple games: 1. Reading and association: choosing the right word for the picture. 2. Visualization: choosing the dynamic moving images for the words. 3. Spelling test: writing words and spell check. Simple interface, HD tablet support, graphic themed photos and high quality voice work by native speaker improve listening comprehension and allow concentrating on the training material. This ensures quick and efficient learning process. Full list of topics: vegetables, fruits, wild animals, pets, house, clothing, colors, transport, body parts, tableware, home appliances, food, toys, school, nature, insects, numbers, geometry, musical instruments, sea life, tools, sports, bathroom, travel, infrastructure, office, miscellaneous. With this interesting and entertaining game you or your child will be able to add new words to their vocabulary through playing. The vocabulary is the foundation for good oral and writing skills. Interactive (adaptive) teaching is an easy and accessible way to study foreign language effectively. For kids, this application is not only a fast and easy way to learn to speak and write, but is also a way to build upon the knowledge acquired at school or kindergarten. Parents can use this app as preschool lessons by method of Glenn Doman for their babies. This is practically an illustrated dictionary and exercises for learning Ukrainian that helps beginners and children to learn Ukrainian words through playing. This is a free app. The paid version has no ads, more words and the option to save the scores of the game.

A fun and easy word search game with none of the hassle of other games out there, it's just words - no bombs, no dying, no pressure! Complete a randomly selected list to level up, super simple and super addicting!

description: Esta aplicación permite activar una alarma que detecte el movimiento y en caso de que el terminal se mueva suene la misma. Características: - Para parar la alarma es necesario introducir un código pin almacenado anteriormente. - La alarma siempre suena al máximo volumen que lo permita el terminal. - Cuando suena la alarma el led de la cámara flashea a modo de sirena (por motivos que desconozco en los Galaxy Nexus esto no funciona, estoy intentando corregirlo) - Al activarse la alarma se usará el GPS o la señal Wifi para almacenar en el terminal un registro de las localizaciones donde ha sonado la alarma. - De no tener activado el wifi este se activará automáticamente al sonar la alarma y volverá a su estado inicial al detenerla. - Uso de Google Maps para mostrar los registros de alarma así como la visualización de la fecha y hora en cada chincheta del registro que aparezca en Google Maps. Esta aplicación requiere de permisos adicionales que están explicados a continuación: - Tu ubicación: Es necesario para poder almacenar los registros de localización del GPS - Comunicación de red: Necesario para poder visualizar los mapas de google maps. - Almacenamiento: Necesario para poder cachear los datos de los mapas de google maps. - Controles de hardware (realizar fotografías y videos): Se usa para poder controlar la cámara del terminal y poder encender el led terminal intermitentemente. - Herramientas del sistema (Conectarse a redes Wifi y desconectarse) : Es usado para poder encender el wifi del terminal en caso de que no esté encendido y así poder usar la localización por antenas. This application enables an alarm which detects the movement and in the event that the terminal moves to sound the same. Features: - To stop the alarm you need to enter a pin code stored previously. - The alarm always sounds at maximum volume permitted by the terminal. - When the alarm LED flashes the camera like a siren (for unknown reasons in the Galaxy Nexus does not work, I'm trying to fix) - When the alarm will use the GPS or wireless signal in the terminal for storing a record of the locations where the alarm has sounded. - We did not have wifi enabled this will automatically activate to sound the alarm and return to its initial state to stop it. - Using Google Maps to display alarm records and display the date and time on each pin of the record appearing in Google Maps. This application requires additional permissions are explained below: - Your location: It is necessary to store the GPS location records - Network Communication: Required for viewing maps google maps. - Storage: Necessary to cache the map data from google maps. - Hardware Controls (take pictures and videos): Used to control the camera's terminal and terminal to turn on the LED flash. - System Tools (Connect to wireless networks and off): This is used to turn on the wireless terminal if it is not lit so you can use the tracking antennas.
release_text: v 1.0.2 - Solucionado el fallo de que cuando se activa la alarma y no salta si se consultan los registros se salía de la aplicación - Traducida al inglés v 1.0.1 - Añadido background en la aplicación - Cuando la alarma está activada se impide que se pueda bajar el volumen del terminal - Pequeños bugs corregidos - La aplicación es excluida de las tareas recientes para que así no se pueda apagar la alarma deslizando el dedo desde el menú tareas recientes.

description: Guobi Hebrew Keyboard ( מקלדת בעברית ) Features: ◇ Guobi Keyboard supports smart input for over 50 languages. ◇ With multiple keyboard designs for each language, you may choose the keyboard which suits you best. ◇ With its smart-learning features, your favourite words, phrases, sentences and other typing habits will be learnt when you type. ◇ Auto word correction intelligently covers you when you mistype. ◇ For fast entry of symbols or numbers, just press on the letter keys and slide upwards. ◇ Keyboard height adjusts automatically to your screen. ◇ No personal information, such as passwords, credit card numbers and other privacy information will be learnt. The keyboard contains Hebrew and English input modes only. If you need other languages, please search and install its keyboard individually. Please be awared that some of the languages are paid keyboards. Here are the keyboard layouts available: Default and Default(R2L). VERY IMPORTANT! To enable the keyboard, go to "Language and keyboard" settings, and check "Guobi Keyboard" box. Then: - on Android < 3.0: long press in any text input area until a popup menu appears, select "Input Method" in this menu, and choose "Guobi Keyboard" in the list. - on Android > 3.0: pull the status bar while the keyboard is visible, and choose "Select Input Method", then "Guobi Keyboard" Languages available: Afrikaans Albanian -- Shqipe Arabic -- اللغة العربية Bangla -- বাংলা Basque -- Euskara Belarusian -- Беларускі Bulgarian -- български Catalan -- Català Danish -- Dansk Dutch -- Netherlands Estonian -- Eesti keel Farsi -- فارسی Filipino -- Tagalog Finnish -- Suomi French -- Français German -- Deutsch Greek -- Ελληνικά Hausa Hebrew -- עברית Hindi -- मानक हिन्दी Hinglish Hungarian -- Magyar Icelandic -- Íslenska Indonesian -- Bahasa Indonesia Irish -- Gaeilge Italian -- Italiano Kannada -- ಕನ್ನಡ Kurdish Kyrgyz -- Кыргыз Malagasy Malay -- Bahasa Melayu Mongolian -- Монгол хэл Nepali -- नेपाली Norwegian -- Norsk Pashto -- پښتو‏ Polish -- Język polski Portuguese Europe -- Português Portuguese South America -- Português Romanian -- Limba română Russian -- Русский язык Slovak -- Slovenčina Slovenian -- Slovenščina Spanish Europe -- Español Spanish South America -- Español Swahili -- Kiswahili Tamil -- தமிழ் Telugu -- తెలుగు Thai -- ภาษาไทย Turkish -- Türkçe Ukrainian -- Українська Uighur -- ئۇيغۇر يېزىقى Urdu -- اُردو‏‎ Uzbek -- U'zbek Vietnamese -- Tiếng Việt Zhuang

Quickly import your contacts into Android phone. Premium contacts back up. Never lose your contacts again. The ultimate contact import and back up solution you need on Android. ================= Contacts Importer is a quick and easy cross-platform solution to help you back up and import your contacts between Android, iphone, ipad, Symbian and Blackberry. Give yourself a secure Android backup and ensure you always have a quick accessible copy. Import your whole address book between phones and tablets in one swift action. Contacts can also be backed up to the cloud and managed online by registering an account at http://i.NQ.com to create your own personal NQ Space. MAIN CAPABILITIES - Back up your contacts privately and securely to NQ Space - Restore contacts directly from your NQ Space - Backup contacts to your SD card - Restore your address book from the SD card - Manage your address book directly through your NQ Space and automatically sync on all your devices

A mortgage calculator, to work out the monthly repayments on a fixed rate, capital-repayment mortgage. You can enter a mortgage amount, an interest rate, and a term in years, and be presented with the repayment amount in real-time as you type. At present there is only the option for repayment of the capital and interest, in future I may also include an interest-only option if desired by users. I welcome any feedback or feature requests, just click on the Send email link below and let me know. With regards to the permissions, it requires access to the internet to load banner adverts at the bottom. Sorry for the adverts, but I've gotta pay my mortgage somehow! :)
release_text: Added localised currency symbol Fixed name of app that appears in notification bar after installing.

description: The new match 3 puzzle game from the makers of hit game, Jewel Dive! Enjoy this classic game with an HD makeover! ◊ BEAUTIFUL graphics that will make your eyes sparkle! ◊ DAZZLING jewel combination effects! ◊ ASTOUNDING sounds that will immerse you into the experience! ◊ Facebook integration that will let you share and compete with your friends! ◊ COMPLETELY FREE FOREVER!

천안버스는 버스노선 및 정류소, 버스 도착 정보를 제공합니다. 노선, 정류소 등의 정보는 천안버스정보시스템과 인터페이스 하므로 앱(데이타) 업데이트 없이 정보를 제공합니다. (천안버스정보시스템에 따라 버스 도착시간이 정확하지 않을 수 있습니다.) [주요기능] 1. 퀵정보 - 즐겨찾기의 퀵정보 속성(퀵정보 표시, 시간, 요일)에 따라 앱을 구동하면 첫 화면에 퀵정보를 표시합니다. - 등교/출근 시간 등에 퀵정보를 설정하여 사용하시면 더욱 편리합니다. ex) 퀵정보표시 체크, 시간 08:00 ~ 09:00, 월/화/수/목/금 2. 버스 정보 - 버스 번호로 검색하여 버스 정보를 확인 할 수 있습니다. - 노선도는 회차지점을 기준으로 분리하여 그리드 양쪽으로 정류소를 표시합니다. 3. 정류소 정보 - 정류소이름 또는 번호로 검색하여 버스 도착 정보를 확인 할 수 있습니다. 4. 버스도착 정보 - 정류소에 도착 정보가 있는 버스를 모두 표시하여 보여준다. - 정류소 위치와 버스 도착정보를 지도에서 확인 할 수 있습니다. 5. 즐겨찾기 - 버스도착 정보에서 즐겨찾기를 추가할 수 있습니다. - 즐겨찾기의 퀵정보 속성 설정에 따라 앱이 실행될때 퀵정보를 표시합니다. ---- 개발자 연락처 : 010 7545 5748 Cheonan bus routes and bus stops, bus arrival information. Routes, bus stops and other information about the system and the interface is so Cheonan App (data) without updating the information. (Cheonan bus system, the bus arrival time information may not be accurate.) [Feature] 1 Quick Information   - Favorites Quick Information Properties (quick information display, time, day), depending on the first screen, a quick drive app information.   - School / work hours and quick to set up and use your information more convenient.     ex) Quick Information Display check, time, 08:00 to 09:00, Mon / Tue / Wed / Thu / Fri 2 bus information   - Search by bus number, you can check the bus information.   - Route based on the Recurrence points separating the sides of the grid to display the stop. 3 stop information   - Search by stop name or number, you can check bus arrival information. 4 bus arrival information   - The bus stop is on the arrivals display all the shows.   - Stop locations and bus arrival information, you can check on the map. 5 favorites   - Bus arrival information can be added to the favorites.   - Favorites Quick Information property is run according to the settings app quick information.

The Simple White Noise app has a lot more to it than just white noise. You can listen to: - White noise - Relaxing rain - Waves by the beach - Crickets in the night - Light traffic - Driving with the road beneath you Or, you can listen to them all at the same time! Simple White Noise app is beautifully presented, and very thoughtfully crafted. Best of all (arguably) there is a built in sleep timer! Do you want the sound to turn off when you fall asleep? Done. You can also cancel the timer if you decide to listen longer. Each sound has a beautiful background to it, so you can really feel immersed in the environment. Study better, sleep better, do things ... better! White noise helps you concentrate.

It has tons of recipes that can help improve or cure almost any health condition. With the expansion you get: -476 new juice recipes (more than double the free app) totally 701 recipes. -22 new health conditions, totaling 181 health conditions. -22 new ingredients, totaling 138 ingredients. -Multi Ingredient Search -Advanced Grocery List - displays the exact amount of ingredients needed for all recipes marked -Calorie Information and filtering capability -Ingredient Management (hide all recipes that contain unwanted ingredients) -All Future Feature Enhancements Vote for feature enhancements on the Juice Pro facebook page! facebook.com/BestJuicingAppEver I have many planned updates for Juice Pro. Many of which have been suggestions from the current users. All Future feature enhancements will only be available through the expansion. The Expansion price will also increase over time as new enhancements are added. By buying the expansion now, you are guaranteed all future updates for the original price paid.

description: The official Electric Sheep application for Android, and winner of a ZKM app art award! Infinite updating live wallpaper as well as interactive app, animations created by a cyborg mind consisting of 450,000 computers and software. The only wallpaper with animated and evolving Fractal Flames. Excellent for meditation, relaxation, and visual dreaming at any time. It comes with 200 download credits built-in (twice as many as in v1.4), each good for one sheep. After they run out you can get more credits with an in-app purchase (for half the price). After downloading the initial flock, you should get a few more each day. The app is specially designed to minimize power consumption. With normal use it should have no measurable impact on the battery, however when it's first installed and is downloading the initial flock it takes more power. It has an option to only download when on a WiFi network, in case you have a limited data plan. Once you install and run it, tap the screen to bring up the status overlay, or hit the menu button to see the main commands, including the preferences where you can change the speed (FPS). By default the speed is set to slow so it's not too distracting and doesn't use too much battery. If you want it to go faster, use the preferences. You can also set it to stop running when your battery gets low. Note: the sheep that you download are saved on your SD card. You can back them up yourself, and share them among your devices. But if a device is wiped, the sheep on it are lost. You can restore the app, and it will come with points that you can download new sheep.
release_text: v2.2: Fix in-app purchases, fix and update battery saver mode, add daydream, new sharing text, double the default flock size. produced by Zen Digital. v2.1: UI polish and small bugfixes. v2.0: Fixed memory leak for smoother playback and less power consumption.

description: Reading these Motivational Quotes each day changes how you think; it changes your life. Here are some motivational quotes that I've chosen out of thousands. description: They're out ta get you, but will they catch you? Fasten your seatbelt, put the pedal to the metal and flee the cops at all cost! Avoid traffic, evade police blockades, collect bonuses and coins, unlock new cars and upgrades! Drive recklessly at supersonic speeds and become the king of the road in this new, addicting arcade game by Jujubee! Get rid of all obstacles in your path, use the nitro boost to smash through other cars and to destroy barricades! Buy magnets, multipliers and other bonuses to collect even more coins, and put all your skills to get as far as possible, with utter disregard for the traffic rules! Compete against your friends on the online leaderboards and lose yourself in this awesome high-octane treat! Features and highlights: - Fun and motivating challenges! - Cool music and real police sounds! - Many great cars to master! - High-speed, addicting action! - Tasty and useful bonuses! - Online leaderboards! - Buttons, tilt and swipe controls - you choose! - Hours of intense arcade action! - Gorgeous visual effects! - A bit of sarcastic humor! - And much more! Hope you'll enjoy this extremely fun ride!

Please, for the love of all little animals, state your device's make & model if you are having any technical issues. This game is tested on many devices and should work well on nearly all android devices. On the blasted freeways of mankind's grim and deadly future, a new world is emerging from the war-torn ruins of the old, a frontier where only the fast and fearless survive. You can make a difference - if you live that long. So check your weapons and weld on another armor plate 'cause it's time to hit the road! Blow enemy cars to bits with a variety of weapons - or just ram them off the road! Smash through traffic with your turbo boost! Engage in epic boss fights. Use your jump module to dodge bullets and even destroy enemy cars! Earn money to buy weapons and other car upgrades. Deathride features bite-sized missions you can easily finish whenever you have a few minutes to spare! It also auto-saves and has a handy pause feature. VIDEO http://www.tinyurl.com/deathride-video

“Lead your Z: Steel Soldiers into the next century rebooted for the rocket fueled fans of the classic hard-core strategy game. In the bloody aftermath of ‘Z’ comes Z: Steel Soldiers. All your favourite strategies and gameplay from the classic version, with graphics that have powered into the 21st century, vivid 3D landscapes, and a state of the art engine that brings your game to life. Meet the new breed of robots, with a taste for war and a warped sense of humour. Z: Steel Soldiers – you’ve never had it so good!” When you take control of your Steel Soldiers unit, you’d better hit the ground running, as you take some superb war machinery straight into the heat of battle. You can start to build up your forces when this firefight is over. Right now you’d better just dig in! Every theatre of the war is intertwined with the non-linear plot, revealing more twists and turns than a roller coaster, this is no ordinary battle, and these are no ordinary troops. They are fearless troops who drink rocket fuel and pick fights with saber-tooth snow slugs just for fun. You've never met robots quite this screwed-up before... Features * 30 Distinct, lush levels spread across 6 unique worlds. * Air, ground and sea units ranging from WW2 based vehicles through to modern jet fighters. * State of the Art 3D Graphics for mobile, packed full of visual providing intense and engaging game-play. * Real-time environment forces, both local and world forces affect the environment to such detail that even plumes of smoke are split as helicopters come soaring through. * 9 different robots each with unique abilities. * Revolutionary fast-resource style gameplay; The more territories you take, the larger the resource ‘flag’ in that territory and the faster and more you can build; leaving you to deal with the real objective – all-out warfare! * Our most advanced AI yet, that will stop at nothing to rid the universe of Zod and his band of space renegades... * Google Game Services - 19 Achievements - 60 Leaderboards Enhanced Features for Tegra users Utilise the power of Tegra4/K1 with exclusive features for even more engaging gameplay and to impress your friends, they include : * Battle Cam * Specular highlights on water * More detailed shadows * Light blooms * Even more spectacular explosions * More details on buildings and vehicles. Plus Optimized for game controllers! Optional support for Bluetooth/USB keyboards, for any hard-core RTS fans! GET READY TO KISS YOUR SHINY METAL BUTT GOODBYE

This program (a successor and complete version of our free app, with more than 17.800 downloads and Google Play 4.4-star) allows, in a simple way, to calculate expenses of your vehicles comparing with two different fuels you specified (gasoline and ethanol, gasoline and gas, two types of gasoline, two different octanes, two fuel branches, etc.) or considering different cars and/or route types (city and highway, for example), estimating the cheaper option, depending on fuel prices and consumptions. Even if you use only one fuel, this program will be useful to calculate expenses. Configure your language (languages supported in this release: English, Spanish and Portuguese), currency, names of vehicles, names of fuels, consumptions. If you entered both consumption values of a vehicle (and/or route) then the program will obtain more accurate results. If consumptions are omitted this program will consider an approximated relation between fuel prices (and consumptions): Comb2/Comb1=0,7 (70%) or another you specified. Press arrows to alter values or select vehicles, or enter values by using the keyboard of your device. Plan: enter the distance of a trip (or week, month or annual distance) in order to calculate the necessary spending (fuel and money).
release_text: - Ajustes no visual. - Nova opção de calculadora de consumo.

description: Are you commuting on Wellington's Metlink public transport? Then Arrivo Wellington is your ideal companion. Arrivo Wellington is a powerful offline timetable app which provides fast timetable access for all transport on Metlink's transport network in Wellington. BUSES, TRAINS, CABLECAR & FERRY. With Arrivo in your pocket you have access to Wellington's transit information anywhere and anytime. Unlike other transit applications you do not need network access to check your timetable information. This means you get results fast. Arrivo makes your commute easy with a variety of benefits: * Arrivo works anytime and anywhere. No data network connection required. * Immediately find the next departure for your Stop. By Route, by Stop name or from your saved Favourites. * View the Stops for your Trip on the map (maps screens require a network connection). * Save your favourite Routes & Stops for convenient access. * Use predictive search from the action bar on the top of the app to quickly find your Route or Stop. * View next Departures for any transit Stop or Station in Wellington. * View Trip details. * All the timetable information is stored on your phone. * Arrivo informs you when updated timetable information is available for download from the 'Settings' screen. Don't worry, Arrivo has the tiniest timetable files among all other transit apps out there. This saves you both bandwidth and storage space on your device. Check your notifications bar to download the most up-to-date timetable available. * Note: all times displayed are local Wellington times. Get access to fast timetable information and download Arrivo Wellington today! For any feedback or bugs please contact us on Twitter (@trip_mate), our website ( http://www.tripmate.info/contact ) or like us on Facebook ( http://facebook.com/tripmateapp ).

description: The best mirror in your phone! And the simpliest and lightweight mirror ever! Use your front camera as a make up mirror, mirror for putting on your contact lenses, mirror to check your hair and all other ways you would use the real mirror. This mirror can do everything normal mirror can but also a lot more! After you try this mirror you won’t need real mirror anymore! How is it different from other mirror applications? It gives you whole picture without cropping it! If you compare it with other mirrors you will see that its image is taller and wider! Now this mirror is very very simple but in the nearest feauture it will gain a lot of cool features! For now you can stop mirrow to take a look at yourself and then start mirror again. In the nearest future it will be possible to take a photo from mirror reflection and share it with friends. Also there will be added a possibility to apply filters to the mirror reflection. If you have any questions or suggestions, please, mail them to me at triladroid@gmail.com .
release_text: It is the first mirror version and it is very very simple.

description: Where do all the socks go? Why can we never find a matching pair? Socks doesn't solve these mysteries, but it does let you play with socks that match. Drag the washing lines from side to side to arrange the socks, then start matching! Simply tap on a pair of socks to make a match, and get huge combo bonuses by finding more pairs. Unlock bonus themes in the store, and leave us a review to let us know you want more themes, and what type of socks you'd like to see in updates!

description: تطبيق لتعليم الاطفال اسماء الاشكال الهندسية باللغة العربية والانجليزية والفرنسية بطريقة جذابة ومميزة باستخدام (تعابير وجوه للاشكال) بحيث يقوم الطفل بالنقر على الشكل ليستمع الى النطق الصحيح له وفي نفس الوقت يتغير تعبير الوجه المستخدم للشكل لاضفاء نوع من السعادة والمرح اثناء عملية التعليم. تطبيق الاشكال تطبيق تعليمي يعلم الأطفال بطريقة مليئة ب التسلية. مميزات التطبيق: - الاشكال/ متوفرة بثلاث لغات العربية الفرنسية والانجليزية English و French , Arabic. - التطبيق سهل الأستخدام و يستطيع استخدامه الأطفال بمفردهم. - سهولة تغيير اللغة . - يوجد زر للمساعدة. -تم إضافة مؤثرات صوتية و اصوات نطق الاشكال لمزيد من التسلية اثناء التعلم. -واجهة التطبيق تشبه الألعاب. - كل الاشكال يتم لفظها بوضوح و بثلاث لغات عربي انجليزي فرنسي . - ملائم للمدارس حيث يستطيع المدرس / المدرسة استخدامه داخل الصف ضمن برنامج دعم التعليم الألكتروني أو المنهاج الألكتروني. - ينصح بإستخدامه للصفوف الأساسية (KG1 , كي جي , KG2 , الصف الأول , بستان ) في حصة الرياضيات / الحساب .

Dry out the waters and let no fish escape! * Play without ads and start with $60 000! * Features: - Crazy fishing action with dynamite - Open world for gill hunting rich in variety - Huge arsenal and gigantic ships to choose from - Dozens of fish in the sea, lakes and rivers - Daily quests and many rewards - Crazy story with even crazier characters - Lunatic achievements and wild high score chases Sail around with your boat across ponds, rivers and seas full of fish and relieve the gill breathers of their guts to make a buck! Pay your daily bills and save some money for the most luxurious ships and most dangerous weapons! Experience a whacked-out story about your dream girl and try not to catch only fish but also the hot Rosemary! * Xperia PLAY optimized * Get in touch with HandyGamesTM : http://www.handy-games.com Join us on Facebook : http://www.fb.com/handygames Stay tuned on Google+ : http://goo.gl/qkjngm Subscribe to our channel on YouTube : http://goo.gl/2Kq6yY Check news on Twitter : http://www.twitter.com/handy_games Follow us on Instagram : http://instagram.com/handygames © www.handy-games.com GmbH

description: x-MusicSurfin' is a unique music player, you can enjoy your music library by hopping around according to the year, artist name, album, etc. It evolves your music experience on a smartphone from ordinary shuffle play. Note: This is still an experimental release. Based on the feedback from music fans, we will work on further development. 1.All you need to prepare is only to copy MP3 or AAC files to the SD card on the smartphone 2.With just one finger, you can browse and find music you want 3.Flick upward or downward on the screen, you can browse music from the list 4.Flick right or left on the screen, you can change the list of music Following five music lists are available 　　-All（All music） 　　-Year（Music list released on the same year） 　　-Composer（Music list by the same composer） 　　-Album（Music list from the same album） 　　-Artist（Music list of the same artist） Find what you want from the lists, tap the artwork to listen! Once you select music, lists will be updated dynamically. It's so easy to find next music. 1. Copy music files to the SD card on the smartphone. (any folder will be OK) 2. Launch x-MusicSurfin', music files will be automatically loaded, artwork will be displayed. 3. Flick upward, downward, left and right to browse music from the list. 4. Find what you want to listen, tap the artwork to listen. 5. User's guide can be launched from the menu. 6. Press back button while playing, music will be kept playing in the background. (Tap the application icon or select the application from status bar to go back to application screen) 7. Press back button while pausing, app will be finished. -We will work on further development according to your feedback. -You can send your feedback from the menu. (Select menu ->About the app -> Feedback) Your voice are very important, so please send us your feedback! Notice： -This application requires Android OS ver2.1 or later -Supported file formats ：MP3(.mp3), AAC(.m4, .3gp) (non copy protected files only) -Artwork may not be displayed, it depends on the ripping software specification.
release_text: Sept.27 -Visual User Guide is added -Music files can be displayed on both SD card and internal strage for OS4.0 later. -OS 4.0 以降のSDカード、Internalストレージの両方の楽曲の表示に対応しました -Several bugs are fixed May 21 -Improve UI with smooth animation -Available file formats are added (.wma, .ogg) -Several bugs are fixed

- This app performs a function to automatically convert the user-specified setting(ringtone, notification, alarm and media, the volume and the brightness of the mobile phone ) to recognize the signals of a particular wireless router. - If the signal from the wireless router is not recognized, the ability to set a return to the state before the conversion. - When the setting is changed, the phone notifies you of changes to vibration or sound. * The wireless router is constantly radiating around send the information called SSID (Service Set identifier) at regular intervals. This information is periodically (default 1 minute) The ability to change the settings of your smartphone to gather. There is no direct connection to the wireless router is required to use this feature. WI-FI is only a function of the smartphone must be enabled.

description: IELTS, or International English Language Testing System, is an international standardized test of English language proficiency. Being able to use a rich vocabulary is a major advantage in the IELTS and will certainly help you get a higher score. It will also be beneficial in your academic, personal and professional life. This app will help you achieve your goal more efficiently: - The database contains a list of about 4500 essential words with pronunciation and a brief definition. - It uses 3 different approaches (Word List, Flashcard and Quiz) to fit in different students’ study habits. - You may mark the words that you’re not familiar with and review only those marked words in Flashcard mode. - It tracks your progress and results for all quizzes you take. Be better prepared! If you find this app helpful, you may also want to try the Pro version for a very small price. https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.juranAndAssociates.ieltsvocabularypro The pro version has about 4000 more words and has no ads.

The French dictionary explains the meaning of French words, based on French Wiktionary. This is a monolingual French dictionary: words must be entered in French. Features: ♦ More than 192000 french definitions, large number of inflected forms and conjugation of verbs ♦ Fast as it works offline, internet is used only when a word is not found in the offline dictionary ♦ You can leaf through words using your finger! ♦ Easy and functional user interface, optimized also for tablets ♦ Bookmarks and history with option to backup your bookmarks ♦ Crossword help: the symbol ? can be used in place of unknown letter ♦ Random search button (shuffle), useful to learn new words ♦ Compatible with Moon+ Reader and FBReader ♦ Themes with user defined text colors You can listen to the word pronunciation, provided that voice data have been installed in your phone (Text-to-speech engine). ⚠ The offline dictionary needs memory. In case your device has low memory, please consider to use the online dictionary: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=livio.dictionary Question & Answers: http://goo.gl/UnU7V Information about permissions used by the application can be found here: http://goo.gl/AsqT4C Information for application developers: ✔ This application provides Dictionary API for 3rd party developers, please read further details: http://thesaurus.altervista.org/dictionary-android This application requires the following permissions: INTERNET - to retrieve the definition of words WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE (aka Photos/Media/Files) - to backup configuration and bookmarks

nogago Hiking Biking Maps provides maps and navigation for Hikers, Road Cyclists and Mountain Bikers. NOW WITH WORLD-WIDE TOPOGRAPHIC MAPS. Map viewing, searching and navigation works always and anywhere with voice directions spoken in many languages. Our routing is optimized for hiking and biking. Compared to Google Maps and other online map services, nogago Maps has the following benefits: - works outside network coverage (i.e., abroad, on the plane, in the mountains, in that valley where coverage is shaky, ...) - avoids expensive data tariffs - gives you more usage time on your trips by consuming fewer power than online apps - does not track you in any way - more precise topographic information (thanks to Jonathan de Ferrantis' viewfinderpanorama elevation models). Download offline maps conveniently and with high speed while having network coverage. You can either download maps by searching for cities that you are interested to visit or navigate on the map to an area that you want to download. All maps, search and navigation features are also available online, in case you did not download a map yet. Map downloads are secured and carried out in German data centers. nogago Hiking Biking Maps & Navigation is open source and licensed under the GPL v3 ( http://www.gnu.org/licenses/gpl-3.0.en.html ). We are happy to have additional contributors, learn more at opensource.nogago.com nogago Hiking Biking Maps & Navigation has been forked from OSMAND to - improve usability, map handling and download - focus features on pedestrian/bike scenarios - manage and control what is transferred to which online provider Our future plans are to - implement your feature requests (send them to support@nogago.com ) - implement hillshading
release_text: Improved Integration with Tracks, Android 4.3 support, ActionBar in MapActivity, increased icons on the map, various bug fixes

description: Constitution of India Questions - Multiple choice questions based on general knowledge Indian Constitution and Policies are asked in various examinations like RAS, IAS, IES, IRS and SSC conducted by RPSC, UPSC and other state level PSCs - UPDATED ALL AMENDMENTS! - A MUST HAVE for every Indian... and others alike. *Features: - Top 200+ frequently asked question from Indian Constitution and policies - Update the latest Amendment of Constitution following to the India’s Government website - Flash Cards section with ability to speak the question and answer. - Automatic shuffle mode to randomize the questions and answers order making each test unique! - Score tracker to track your progress. - Review your answers and you can leave the feedback to improve this apps better.

description: "DONUT TYCOON THE BOARD GAME" is a fusion of the time management game and the board game(like the Monopoly). You can enjoy the thrill of the management game and the addictiveness of the board game simultaneously. You’ll walk on the way for the master of donut business. Work proceeds by your dice. Roll the dice and make corresponding moves. In the land you arrive, a special event will happen. You should make your store in as many lands as possible.(Board game) At a store, you can play the donut business game. Make and sell the donuts people want to earn money.(Time management game.) If you arrive at a rival store, you can take the enemy’s store. And at a store of yours, you can increase the sales of the store. Anyway do your best to earn more than the goal money. There is a ‘chance card’ which makes your business more efficient. It is similar to the magic card of the trading card game. The ‘Chance card’ will help you greatly. It is a very important fact which makes this game exciting. FEATURES Three game styles in one. -Board game with dice.(like the Monopoly) -Card game.(like the Magic the Gathering) -Donut game.(Creative management game) The rule of this game isn’t difficult. Just choose what you want as the flow. You can try the donut business game in the Arcade mode separately. Never miss this game, if you want a creative and substantial entertainment. Easy and addictive the ‘Donut Tycoon the board game' will keep your adrenaline going.
release_text: bug fix. 'Back to menu' button added.

description: MP Fishing Calendar — is a program for the smartphone, which will tell what kind of fish are caught when and when not to. Here are just a few reasons to install on your phone our fishing calendar:  - The maximum number of fish;  - Mathematical models of fish based on their own analysis;  - It does not require an internet connection - and it is convenient for fishing;  - User-friendly interface;  - The probability of the catch is presented by comparative diagrams within a day;  - The probability of catch certain species of fish is a convenient schedule a month in advance;  - Personal settings list of fish;  - Regular updates, corrections and additions. Fishing calendar gives long-period forecast of the probability of biting. Examine the scientific evidence about the lifestyle of different species of fish. Then, mathematical models of the likelihood of their catch, depending on: the climate zone and time of year. Then, a mathematical model of the effect of catch relative position of the Sun, Earth and Moon - Phases of the Moon. List of species of fish, which is based on your personal calendar can be customized. Calendar fisherman to determine when in the near future we plan to check out fishing. Chance to catch a fish displays by four levels: an excellent, good bite, bad bite and none. Everything is simple and intuitive. The application is fully installed in your mobile phone and works even when the ban on Internet connection.   The application can be moved to SD-card - not to hold the phone memory. Internet is used only to display the map - to select a point. GPS is used to automatically determine the point.
release_text: 2.0.0: We construct new models of climatic zones. Added the function of the choice of forecasting on the world map. Refined mathematical models of fish. Posted 61 species of fish, now calendar is based on 90 species of fish.

description: Over 40 Million likes and 6 Million frequent users on Facebook! The world's most successful endless runner – now available for your Android device!" -> What is Stick Run? Stick Run challenges players to run as far as possible through a randomly generated side-scrolling level filled with deadly obstacles. Stick Run was created by 16-year-old student Manuel Otto from Germany and became a smash hit on Facebook. The game counts over 6 million monthly active users! -> How does it work? Obstacles range from single crates to stacks of them, panes of glass and rotating saw blades. Running headlong into walls of crates or any saw blade ends the game, at which point players can restart and try again. Achievements can be unlocked for meeting certain performance criteria. Stick Run Mobile takes only a minute to learn, but a life to master! -> Game Features • Android version of the Facebook smash hit! • New intuitive „2-thumbs control“ • Collect ingame currency and items • Cool power-ups • International leaderboards • Dozens of challenging achievements
release_text: - new Marathon mode: Challenge others in multi-part races in New York, Tokyo, Boston and many more cities or compete in our special Halloween-Marathon to win awesome new items such as gear and city backgrounds!

description: This app is used to control a WiFi connected GoPro camera. When camera control is started, the app constantly monitors the device's current location. When the device is within a certain radius of one or more preset triggers, the app sends a command to GoPro camera to either start or stop recording a video. It was primarily developed for use on a motorcycle, where it is inconvenient to have to stop and fiddle with the camera, especially if it's not mounted within easy reach. But it can also be used in any situation in which you set the start/stop points in advance and then let the app handle recording control for you, for example on a ski slope, while bicycling,... You can set triggers to start, restart, stop and toggle recording. Triggers can also be set to activate only when you pass the point in a certain direction. Context-sensitive help is available on every screen of the application. The app only requests permissions that are absolutely necessary for the correct functioning of the app. The app does not collect any personal information, does not collect any usage statistics and does not send any information anywhere else. The app does not and never will include any form of advertising. Before downloading this app please make sure that you can connect to your GoPro camera via WiFi and that you can control it remotely with an Android app. You will find detailed instructions on the GoPro web site.
release_text: Google's proximity alerts are unreliable, causing triggers to be randomly missed! Substituted own proximity alerts which work perfectly. WiFi reconnection is much more intelligent (some more optimisation in v1.3.1) Notification area is used when camera cannot be connected Bugfix: Some preferences sometimes didn't get read

description: Turn your mobile device into a personal English tutor with ETS® TOEIC® content. Sharpen your English speaking skills anytime, anywhere using your mobile device. SpeakingPal Ltd. has teamed up with Educational Testing Service (ETS), creator of the TOEFL® and TOEIC® tests, to bring you SpeakingPal Plus!(TM) — a mobile-learning product that turns your mobile phone into a personal English tutor. SpeakingPal Plus! is a subscription-based English-language learning system that offers a unique range of interactive exercises, role playing and language activities with premium content from ETS. You speak — SpeakingPal Plus listens … Simply talk with a video character and get immediate feedback on how well you just spoke. And, you can download it for free! SpeakingPal Plus! provides: • A friendly speaking partner/tutor that’s available anytime, anywhere • Customized content that helps build user confidence • Personalized and immediate feedback • A variety of practice opportunities • Simulation of real-life situation • An interactive and entertaining English learning tool Key Features: • ETS authentic TOEIC content and activities • Voice activated — uses speech recognition • Interactive video dialogs • Dialog flow control for your answers • Characters to role play • Instant feedback on your voice responses • Feedback given for each sentence and each word • Color-coded scoring for easy evaluation • Native speakers to compare your speech with • Short, effective sessions; less than two minutes each • Progress page to track your improvement • Recordings and scores to share with your friends
release_text: * Support for xhdpi screens (such as Galaxy Nexus/S3). * Bigger video layout for 10" tablets.

description: Pre-Algebra calc brings a simple way to check your answers and get help with Math. It was designed to help adults returning to college but would be great for anyone taking a pre-algebra course. It has formulas to help you solve equations as well as calculators. This program will do: • Rounding numbers to a specified place • Solve trinomial equations and factor basic ones • There is a calculator • Will find the “Least Common Multiple” and the “Greatest Common Divisor” of two numbers • Will solve linear equations • Solves the basic Graphing formulas o Slope, equation of a line, distance, midpoint, x and y intercepts • Change percent to decimal or fraction • Will solve perimeter and area for basic shapes • Will do the FOIL method on binomials
release_text: Updated the Calculator: Added more features, does inequalities and other algebra functions

description: New in Version 2.x - ability to only enable the sites you care about and change the order of the deal sites listing This application allows you to stay up to date with the sites that have the 'true' daily deal. This app tracks the Amazon GoldBox daily deal, Amazon Lightning deals, Woot deals, PricePlunge, ThatDailyDeal, Yugster daily deal and more! This application includes a widget for Amazon GoldBox deal and also has the option to be notified when Amazon lightning deals are updated. This is a perfect app if you like to save money and take advantage of daily deal websites. We created this out of our own need because we reviewed several other deal apps and none tracked our favorite Amazon. We also added others that we could not find and use like buy.com, dailysteals, etc.. If you love the Amazon GoldBox deals and the Amazon Lightning deals you will want this app! New sites are added from time to time and requires no update to the app. NOTE: If you want to use the widget do NOT move the app to sdcard. No widget will show up if the app is stored on the sdcard We will read each comment and update our app when we get feedback. Please rate the app and let us know if we are missing any other great deal sites that should be added!

description: Just like having a Tour Guide in your car! Don't miss out on the best sights as you drive the famous Icefields Parkway, voted the World's Most Beautiful Mountain Drive. This tour app can be driven either from Lake Louise to Jasper or Jasper to Lake Louise. * Plays commentary AUTOMATICALLY as you drive * No Data or network connection required. Works off-line * Prepared by Professional Tour Guides * 150+ commentary points * Fraction of cost of bus tours or guide books Turn your phone or tablet into a Tour Guide and take your driving tours and sightseeing to a whole new level with the GyPSy Guide – GPS Tour of the Icefields Parkway in the Canadian Rockies. Commentary plays AUTOMATICALLY as you drive so you don't miss any of the best sights and stories along the way. This tour includes the most popular sightseeing stops and many more: 1) Athabasca Falls 2) Sunwapta Falls 3) Stutfield Glacier 4) Columbia Icefields and Ice Explorer 5) Peyto Lake 6) Bow Lake and Crowfoot Glacier Let GyPSy be your guide as it helps you work out the best places for you to visit by giving you helpful information so you can make good decisions and make the most of the time you have available. ** This app works OFF-LINE while you are touring. There is no need to have a network or wireless connection. Once downloaded, this tour REQUIRES NO DATA to operate and activate, so you won’t incur roaming or data charges. YOU DO NOT REQUIRE A CELLULAR NETWORK CONNECTION TO TOUR!! You will not incur any data roaming charges to use this tour, even if you are from outside of Canada. Works Off-line and with Data Roaming turned OFF. Professional tour guides have filled the guide with interesting and entertaining stories, loads of tips and advice on what to do and will point out places of interest as you approach them. There are 151 commentary points available. You can drive the entire Icefields Parkway in either direction between Jasper and Lake Louise, or drive to the Icefields Centre and back. It’s just like driving around with a local expert. Just download the app on Wi-Fi from your network at home or use any free Wi-Fi network. Because the app is filled with audio commentary and maps, its larger than "normal" apps. Many phone/data networks will block the download because of size - so its important to download over a Wi-Fi network. This tour is not just a directory but a designed tour to follow, just like how a tour guide would take you. It’s simple and entertaining; just let GyPSy provide commentary automatically as you travel. ++ Continued use of GPS running in the background can dramatically decrease battery life - we strongly recommend taking a car charger.

description: Blackjack Card Counter app helps in maintaining the Running Card count of Blackjack also known as 21. A player can win a hand against dealer and make money if he is able to Hit Blackjack, or stay close to count 21 and beat dealer's hand count or Not to get burst and stay in the game and hope dealer gets busted. This app can help you in making smart decision and achieve above goals. This app not only helps in card counting but provides other useful stats during card counting such as Total Number of High Cards dealt ,% Of Cards Dealt etc. Make your moves or place bets based on total # of cards dealt, Deck running status and % of each type of card dealt. Win more hands and win more money.

Bunny Run 2D is a fun and challenging running game. Try to run as far as you can by avoiding all the obstacles on the way. Eat as many carrots as you can while running and you will be awarded with a limited time powerful shield. *Tap up or down arrow to "Jump" or "Slide" to avoid obstacles.

Reverse Gravity is a physics based puzzle game for android phones and tablets. Guide your ball by drawing lines and reversing gravity and collect all the gems on screen. Change, mix and manipulate your colour to hit special gems. A higher score is awarded for reversing gravity as little as possible. With 4 worlds and 36 levels Reverse Gravity is the best way to kill time,avoid awkward social situations and anything in between. Email us any questions, concerns or ideas, we'd love to hear them.

You too you can go to the Olympic in Russia… in the “cleaning the toilets” category! Between the well-trained athletes and their many spectators, there is a huge risk that the pipes get clogged if you don’t take these matters into your own hands… just don’t forget to put gloves on. Moreover, the architects have had the superb idea of creating toilets for groups in which some individual now have gotten used to make snowmen… except they’re not made out of snow… Become the champion of cleaning in Sochi Toilets: official game, a game plebiscited by cleaning ladies. Sochi Toilets: official game is a parodic management game in wich you must deal with queues of clients who are in a hurry. Give them a seat before presenting to them a large panel of paper to wipe their behind with. Don’t forget to make them pay before they leave… and to clean their mess while you’re at it… unless the smell doesn’t disturb you. Go through sixty levels and deal with an ever growing mass of clients that are seriously in a hurry. Test your rapidity and your management ability in this arcade like game and help Russia not being famous for its toilets… pretty please? « A game that ease my bowel movements» - Mikhaïl G « That was NOT chocolate » - Vladimir L « Russian used to be classier in the past… but the games were less fun :D » - J. Bond « The perfect game when comes the time to find out the side effects of vodka» Joseph S CARACTERISTICS - 60 levels - 300 stars to collect - Best score - Touch the screen to interact

Three titles from the award-winning 3D Grimm’s series in one convenient app. Grimm’s Rapunzel, Grimm’s Red Riding Hood and Grimm’s Hansel and Gretel. I recommend this app quite highly and know that little ones will come back to it again and again. Great work all around!" ~ David Winograd, TUAW "StoryToys has near-brilliantly rethought children's books. This application evolves the very concept of what a story can be."~ Jeremy Horowitz, iLounge “Every page keeps the reader wanting more. The interactivity of the pop up pages is superb.” - Leanne McGinty, Ahgoo Review “Stunning. If I had to sum up this app in one word it would absolutely be stunning.” ~ Danielle Smith, TheresABook.com The first in a series of StoryToys’ Collection apps presents the classic tales of Rapunzel, Red Riding Hood and Hansel and Gretel with a sprinkling of StoryToys magic. Each app is presented in 3D form, just like a real pop-up book. Between the pages of text are interactive scenes carefully woven into the fabric of the tale. In these scenes young readers become involved in the story through a series of fun games and actions. Extra features include Sticker Books and Jigsaw Puzzle Packs for even more fun! With the 3D Sticker Books, young readers can get creative making their very own scenes with characters, backgrounds and props from each book. By pressing the play button the 3D scenes come to life with movement, music and even speech. The Puzzle packs have four levels of difficulty for each puzzle catering for players of all ages. Key features: • Full 3D experience - it’s just like a real book • Wonderfully illustrated, with beautiful, colorful imagery • Fully narrated in each language by professional actors • Read to Me, Read it Myself, and Autoplay modes • At least 30 beautifully presented pages of text in each book • Plenty of interactive 3D pop-up scenes with simple tasks and games to perform • Features a beautiful musical score and lots of amazing sound effects • Fully localized for English, French, German, Spanish, Italian, Korean and simplified Chinese Awards for Grimm’s Rapunzel, Hansel and Gretel and Red Riding Hood: • Mom's Choice Silver Award, 2012 • iLounge Best iPhone iPod kids app of the year 2011 • Best Kids' App Winner, 'Best App Ever Awards', 2010 • Editor's Choice Award for Excellence in Design, Children's technology Review, 2011 • Longlisted for the DBW Publishing Innovation Award, 2010 • Finalist About.com Readers' Choice Award ________________________________________________________________________ Don’t forget to share your review below, we’d love to hear what you think! This is launches Octave for Android. Octave is like Matlab (trademark of Mathworks), but free (as in freedom) software. Not some similar program, but really Octave running natively. The app is now free (as in $) to use, but a donation is appreciated to keep things going. You are required to get the Octave Main Package (com.octave.main) to use this. You are required to get the Octave Gnuplot Package (com.octave.gnuplot) to support plotting. There are many additional packages (com.octave.*) for use. This is a different sort of app. Unpacking the executable and other files necessary for Octave to run will take awhile when you install or upgrade this, but will be worth it. Whether this is installed to the sdcard or to internal storage, the executables and libraries will take up around 100MB of internal storage either way. You can add .m files and a .octaverc startup file in an external storage directory setup for you. Often at /sdcard/GNUOctave/home. Your latest plots (.png files) can be found in an external storage directory setup for you. Often at /sdcard/GNUOctave/intents. You will be running in a fake chroot of sorts which includes Octave and many of the programs you expect to find in a standard GNU/Linux (read Debian) install. The fake chroot is split between your external/shared partition (often /sdcard) and your internal (/data/data/com.octave) to save space. Plot commands and edit commands fire off intents to use whatever image viewer or text editor you have. See Octave Documentation: http://www.gnu.org/software/octave/doc/interpreter/ See the FAQ: https://github.com/corbinlc/octave4android/wiki/FAQ File bugs and feature requests here: https://github.com/corbinlc/octave4android/issues See code here for packages here: https://github.com/corbinlc/octave4android This launcher is licensed under the Apache License 2.0. No GPL licensed code is found within this app, but is found in the packages needed to run.
release_text: Direct people to a new version of Octave com.gnuroot.octave . It will require you to install and setup GNURoot Debian. It will take up more storage, but combined with GNURoot Debian, you will have a fully functional and expandable Linux distro. It works with the latest versions of Android (this doesn't). It does not nag for donation (this did). It is fully open source (this isn't).

app_name: WH Questions At Home Fun Deck
description: What do you do on weekends? This colorful, educational social skills App for Android has all 56 illustrated picture flash cards (plus audio of each card text) from the “WH” Questions At Home Fun Deck® by Super Duper® Publications. Select the cards you want students to see, and have them ask and answer questions about all aspects of home life. The prompts include WH questions like, “Who are your neighbors?” and “Where do you keep your clothes?” This App is simple to use — each student looks at an illustration and either reads the prompt or touches the screen to listen to the prompt. The student then gives a verbal response. After each answer, tap the green (correct) or red (incorrect) button to score the student’s verbal response. Move to the next card by sliding the card currently on the display screen to the side, and the next image appears. Move to the next player by sliding the bar at the top of the screen. When you finish, view the results and email them to as many addresses as you like. “WH” Questions At Home Fun Deck App lets you: Select all 56 cards or just the ones you want students to see. Enter all your students’ names. Track correct and incorrect responses for an unlimited number of students. Email your results at the end of each game. (Note: The App resets all data to zero at the start of each new game, so at the end of a game, email yourself any data you want to keep.)

The Whistle Android Finder PRO is supreme Android finder (phone locator) application which helps many people locate their Android device with just a simple WHISTLE after losing it, forgetting it somewhere or being hidden somewhere in a room on a desk behind papers, in a briefcase or in a coat pocket etc. The free version of this application named Whistle Android Finder FREE (also available in Google Play) has reached more than 2 MILLION downloads!! But now, after reading and taking into account more than 17,000 user comments, wishes, and suggestions, it is time to upgrade the application with new features, several important whistle engine improvements, a better user interface, customized notification melodies, lower battery consumption and much more. This is the story about how Whistle Android Finder PRO was born! Here are the main features of the Whistle Android Finder PRO : In contrast to the free, ad-supported version, the paid Whistle Android Finder PRO does not include any ads! Furthermore, the set of requested permissions is much lower now. Only the essential permissions are requested. Much lower battery consumption due to optimized whistle detection engine when compared to the Whistle Android Finder FREE. The application has been designed and strongly optimised in order to reduce battery drain as much as possible. Customized whistle notification sounds are supported in PRO version. Simply select any MP3 or M4A music and apply it as notification! Under the Whistle Android Finder PRO settings tab it is also possible to choose among 20 different very amusing preloaded audio notification sounds to notify the presence of the detected whistle! Whistle Android Finder PRO can be enabled or disabled under the settings tab. Just run the application and the settings tab will appear! Remember: Whistle detection is working ONLY when the device is sleeping (i.e. when the screen is OFF). Once enabled, Whistle Android Finder PRO will work even if you reboot your Android device! Of course, you can disable it under the settings tab at any time. It is possible to choose among 5 different whistle detection sensitivity levels! Whistle Android Finder PRO is just ready to adapt to any Android device regardless of the specifics of integrated acoustic components. Once your whistle sound is detected, the Android device will respond to your whistling with playback of preselected audio notification signal. Furthermore, the display of a "sleeping" Android device is illuminated in order to easily locate your device in your bag or in a dark room for example. Under the preferences tab a user can also select (and approve) the usage of maximum possible volume for audio notification regardless of current media volume settings. However, Whistle Android Finder PRO is designed to resume your current media volume when audio notification is not played. Whistle Android Finder PRO is based on sophisticated but computationally optimised Digital Signal Processing techniques to analyse captured audio signals from the environment and search for distinct time-frequency patterns of a typical human whistle. The incorporated DSP algorithm is not signal energy based, therefore this whistle detector is much more accurate and reliable than similar applications found elsewhere on Google Play. Remember, just whistle and your Android will respond!

description: Pet pals forever! Join 4 adorable kittens & 4 puppies in 6 crazy fun games & adventures! Care for these puppy & kitten BFFs when you feed, clean, and groom them for all sorts of fun! Puppy & kitten bash! Dress BFFs up, get BFFs to pose for a picture in photo fun, and even sing along with BFFs! Get ready for the cutest adventure of all! It’s time to play and take care of all the puppies and kittens! Feed’em! Feed all the puppy & kitten & watch them wag their tails and pur with happiness! Give the BFFs steak, pieces of fish, & even dog food! Give them the right food though or they won’t eat it! Dress up time! Those puppies and kittens can’t wait to be all dressed up! Pick all the right clothes and accessories to make puppies & kittens the most glamorous puppy & kitten the world has ever seen! Race to see who can get dressed faster & fill up their tool bar first-- they’ll win a star! Grooming fun! Every pup and kitten needs to have fun but sometimes it can get a little messy and they can get some stuff tangled up in their fur! Use brushes, tweezers, & toothbrushes to make them look purrrrfect again! Photoshoot! These puppies and kittens are special, but the whole world doesn’t know yet! It’s your job to make them do the best poses and put them in the best scene possible to show the world just how adorable they are! Shower time! Take a bath! Use shampoo and soap before using the blow dryer to dry a puppy & kitten! Be careful, they can always splash water around so be sure to use the right techniques! It’s showtime! Now that they’re as clean as can be, give the pups and kittens the chance of a lifetime to become the stars that they’ve always wanted to be! Play with them in the fun musical game we’ve got in store for you in this app! Features: > Tap to select your puppy and kitten pals! > Feed the puppies and kittens a whole range of different foods! > Give them a shower with the shampoo, and dry them up with the blow dryer afterwards! > Use the brushes to get their fur really soft and free of all twigs and leaves! > Pick the best clothes combinations for the puppies and kittens then mix and match the accessories for fun! What's inside: > 4 adorable pairs of cats and dogs! > 6 outrageously fun activities! > Hundreds of outfits & accessories to choose from! > 4 tools to clean the pets! > 10 kinds of food to feed them! > 1 photoshoot scene to show your adorable pet! > 1 song scene to enjoy! app_name: スマホに統計のグラフが降ってくる！
description: 「スマホに統計のグラフが降ってくる！」略して「統計グラフ！」は、様々な最新の日本の統計データとその解説を配信するサービスです。 様々な統計のグラフが、解説と共に配信されて来ます。 自動でデータが更新される為、ユーザーはいつも最新の統計を見る事が出来ます。 データはCSVを必要に応じて取ってきて、実際に端末上でグラフを描いています。 この為、ユーザーはただ配信されたグラフを見るだけで無く、自身で軸の範囲を変更したり、ちょっとした計算を行って変形したりする事が出来ます。 使われている言語はRのサブセットで、Qと呼んでいます。 "Statistics graph!" Is a service that delivers the explanation and statistical data of the latest Japanese various "graph of statistics come raining smartphone!" For short. Graphs of various statistics will come is delivered along with the commentary. Because the data is updated automatically, the user can see the latest statistics always. To come taken if necessary CSV, data has drawn the graph on the terminal actually. Therefore, the user can not you just see the graph just been delivered, you can change the range of the axis itself, or deformed by performing a little calculation. A subset of R, I call Q the language used.
release_text: 0.12 csvのurlの一覧を、ローカルのファイルからサーバーサイドのテーブルを使うように変更。NAのベクトルの振る舞いをRに近づける。ユーザー定義関数でread.csvを呼んだ時にキャッシュに入ってないとexceptionになる問題を修正。 0.11 「共有」をwebのURLを共有するように変更。該当するwebのURLのインテントに反応するように変更。 0.10 一日に一回更新をチェックするように。Google Spread Sheetのバージョンアップに対応。 0.9 which.min, which.max, if else, <<-による代入の実装。添字アクセスの強化。 0.8 unique、which、matrix、svd、diag、t、^、$、%*%のサポート。未定義シンボルのエラーメッセージを改善。スクラッチや出力のEditTextでコピーをしようとするとタイトルバーが隠れる問題を修正。 0.7 BACKでグラフを隠すように変更。sapply実装。未定義関数のエラーメッセージを改善。

description: Being and Thinking !!! This strategy Game will make you think and concentrate for hours if you accept the challenge. The game will randomly place three color balls on the game board at every round, you have to strategically select one ball (tap on ball) and move it to the most convenient location (tap on square). Lines of 5 or more balls of the same color are eliminated, adding to the score. Lines game or balls online is a clone of a famous Russian board game which was played in almost every PC - equipped office in the 90 - 92. Now it's a android game designed to help you overcome cubicle boredom. Lines Strategy Pro have beautiful graphics :)

This application is only for the IIM-Ahmedabad community! The app will automatically setup the access point for IIM-A WiFi network when the username and password is provided. This automatic setup includes: - setting up a new access point - setting up the proxy for that access point - making the changes to the access point settings which pertain to the IIM-A WiFI network settings ONLY DEVICES WITH ANDROID VERSION 4.0.3 AND UPWARDS ARE SUPPORTED BY THIS APP!!! Following is the list of devices we have tested this to be working on: https://docs.google.com/spreadsheet/ccc?key=0AtYRe94t6c1ndHBPSFFaQXpxNWhlT0lNZjdidHlpQ3c&usp=sharing Disclaimer --------------- The open source app Wifi Advanced Configuration Editor (WifiACE) was used as as base and I have build on its capabilities to provide a solution specific to the network setting used in IIM-A. I would like to thank Marcus905, OddRain for providing the sources to the original app. Source code of this app is available on git: https://github.com/DooMLoRD/iima_campuswifi Some Instructions -------------------------- In case you already have WiFi working on you android device there is no need to install this app! Before you begin, remove any saved access points. Steps to Setup ---------------------- 1) Select the access point to setup 2) Enter the IIM-A username (without the @iimahd.ernet.in part) 3) Enter your WiFi password 4) Click on SAVE Troubleshooting ----------------------- 1) If you do not remember your password, please contact CCC 2) If you are getting "Disconnected" prompt try disabling and then re-enabling WiFi 3) If the device is still not able to connect, recheck the password, delete the access point ("Forget Network") from the Wifi Setting menu, restart app and do the setup again

Great flight simulator parking game If you like driving airplanes, cars, motorbikes, trucks or helicopters this is the game for you Fly the rc helicopter racing around the house avoiding any obstacles. Kill the toy soldiers by shooting them with your missiles. Shoot whiskey bottles and watch them explode.

Baby explorer is a fun learning program for children of all ages. Contains 17 games in one (in Full version): - Sound animated learning of letters and numbers. - Learn to recognize animals and their sounds. - Distinguish shapes and colors and match the pieces. - Distinguish between colors and show your ability to move animated balls around the screen. - Practice your memory with fruits learning mode. - Match the pictures and play with wooden pieces. - Learn the sound of musical instruments and play their music. - Create your first musical melodies playing the xylophone. - Play puzzles with pictures of your environment. - Play with butterflies, fish and other animals. - Discover amazing fun with soap bubbles and balloons. - Draw funny pictures with a lot of pencils and colors. - Listen and learn the funny sound of the most familiar vehicles. - Improve reflexes flying a toy plane. Children can have fun playing for a long time. you can also acquire the following skills by playing this game: - Improve children's skills of memory, concentration and development of knowledge of their environment. - Help with the recognition of the letters in the alphabet. - Keep children entertained with fun sound effects and animal sounds, musical instruments and vehicles .. - The game is adapted to be handled easily. - It's specifically designed as an educational tool interface for preschoolers and up.
